English Sentences: For as much as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us,
Wolaitta Sentences: Bonchcho Tewofiloosaa, koiro bantta aifiyan be7idaageetuppenne Xoossaa qaalaa odidaageetuppe ekkidoogaadan,

English Sentences: Even as they delivered them unto us, which from the beginning were eyewitnesses, and ministers of the word;
Wolaitta Sentences: nu matan polettida Yohuwaassi daroti taarikiyaa maaran maaran xaafanau doommidosona.

English Sentences: It seemed good to me also, having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first, to write unto thee in order, most excellent Theophilus,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, neeni tamaarido yohuwaa geeshshada erana mala, taani qassi koiruwaappe doommada, ubbaa akeekan qorada,

English Sentences: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things, wherein thou hast been instructed.
Wolaitta Sentences: maaran maaran neessi xaafikko, lo77o yaagada qoppaas.

English Sentences: There was in the days of Herod, the king of Judaea, a certain priest named Zacharias, of the course of Abia: and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron, and her name was Elisabeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa biittaa kawuwaa Heeroodisa wodiyan, Zakkaariyaasa yaagiyo issi qeesee de7ees. I Abiiya qeesetuppe issuwaa. A machchiyaanne qeesiyaa Aaroona zare; i sunttai Elssaabeexo.

English Sentences: And they were both righteous before God, walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti naa77aikka Xoossaassi xillo gididi, Godaa higgiyaanne azazuwaa ubbaa moorennan, naagidi polidosona.

English Sentences: And they had no child, because that Elisabeth was barren, and they both were now well stricken in years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elssaabeexa maine gidido gishshau, etassi na7i baawa; naa77aikka daro cimidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that while he executed the priest's office before God in the order of his course,
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta qeesetu kayan Zakkaariyaasi Xoossaa sinttan oottishin, qeesetu meeziyaadan,

English Sentences: According to the custom of the priest's office, his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi, ixaanaa cuwayanau saamai a gakkiis.

English Sentences: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ixaanaa i cuwayiyo wode, asai ubbai karen eqqidi, Xoossaa woossees.

English Sentences: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa kiitanchchai ixaanaa i cuwayiyo sohuwaappe ushachcha baggaara eqqidi, ayyo beettiis.

English Sentences: And when Zacharias saw him, he was troubled, and fear fell upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zakkaariyaasi hegaa be7idi, dagammidi yayyin,

English Sentences: But the angel said unto him, Fear not, Zacharias: for thy prayer is heard; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son, and thou shalt call his name John.
Wolaitta Sentences: kiitanchchai Zakkaariyaasa hagaadan yaagiis; "Yayyoppa; ne woosai siyettiis. Ne machchiyaa Elssaabeexa neessi attuma na7a yelana; neeni he na7aa Yohaannisa yaagada sunttana.

English Sentences: And thou shalt have joy and gladness; and many shall rejoice at his birth.
Wolaitta Sentences: I yelettin, neeni daro ufaittana; haratikka ufaittana.

English Sentences: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord, and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost, even from his mother's womb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa sinttan i gita gidana; mattoyiyaabaanne woine eessa uyenna. Biron ba aayee uluwan de7ishin, Geeshsha Ayyaanai aani kumana.

English Sentences: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaappe daruwaa Godaakko, eta Xoossaakko, zaarana;

English Sentences: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias, to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children, and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaassi asaa giigissanau, aawatu wozanaa naatukko zaaranau, azazettennaageetakka xillotettaa eraassi zaaranau, Eelaasa ayyaanaaninne wolqqan Godaappe sinttaara bees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Zacharias said unto the angel, Whereby shall I know this? for I am an old man, and my wife well stricken in years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zakkaariyaasi, "Taani cima; ta machchiyaanne ceeggaasu; hegaa ta aibin eranee?" yaagidi, kiitanchchaa oichchiis.

English Sentences: And the angel answering said unto him, I am Gabriel, that stand in the presence of God; and am sent to speak unto thee, and to shew thee these glad tidings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchai zaarettidi yaagiis; "Taani Xoossaa sinttan eqqiya Gabreela; taani ne sinttan eqqada haasayanau, qassi ha mishiraachchuwaa neessi odanau, tana Xoossai neekko kiittiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, thou shalt be dumb, and not able to speak, until the day that these things shall be performed, because thou believest not my words, which shall be fulfilled in their season.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i siya; ba wodiyan polettana ta qaalaa neeni ammanabeenna gishshau, ta neessi odido yohoi polettanaashin, neeni duudana; ne doonai haasayanau danddayenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the people waited for Zacharias, and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon i waanidi gam77idee?" yaagidi garamettiiddi, asai zakkaariyaasa naagees.

English Sentences: And when he came out, he could not speak unto them: and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple: for he beckoned unto them, and remained speechless.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kare i kiyido wode, haasayanau danddayibeenna. Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon i aibakko ajjuutan be7idoogaa asai akeekiis; duudidaagee biradhdhiiddi haasayees.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished, he departed to his own house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba oosuwaa wodiyaa wurssidi, soo biis.

English Sentences: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived, and hid herself five months, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodiyaappe guyyiyan, a machchiyaa Elssaabeexa shahaarada, ichchashu aginau bana genttaasu.

English Sentences: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me, to take away my reproach among men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elssaabeexa, "Xoossai taakko xeelliis; asa sinttan tana yeellaappe ashshanau maaddiis" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee, named Nazareth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Usuppuntta aginan Xoossai kiitanchchaa Gabreela Galiila biittan Naazireete giyo katamaa kiittiis.

English Sentences: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph, of the house of David; and the virgin's name was Mary.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita zare gidiya Yooseefa giyo bitaniyaassi giigida issi geela7eekko Xoossai a kiittiis; he geela7ee sunttai Mairaamo.

English Sentences: And the angel came in unto her, and said, Hail, thou that art highly favoured, the Lord is with thee: blessed art thou among women.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchai ikko yiidi, "Daro doorettidaaree, saro; Godai nenaara de7ees; nena i daro anjjiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when she saw him, she was troubled at his saying, and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaama hegaa siyada daro dagammaasu. Dagammada, "Hegee woigiyo sarotee?" yaagada qoppaasu.

English Sentences: And the angel said unto her, Fear not, Mary: for thou hast found favour with God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchai hagaadan yaagiis; "Mairaamee yayyoppa; Xoossan sabettadasa;

English Sentences: And, behold, thou shalt conceive in thy womb, and bring forth a son, and shalt call his name JESUS.
Wolaitta Sentences: be7a; neeni shahaarada attuma na7a yelana; a sunttaa Yesuusa yaagada sunttana.

English Sentences: He shall be great, and shall be called the Son of the Highest: and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David:
Wolaitta Sentences: I gita gidana; qassi Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa Na7a geetettana; Godai ayyo a aawaa Daawita kawotettaa immana;

English Sentences: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever; and of his kingdom there shall be no end.
Wolaitta Sentences: inne Yaaqoobantta zariyan merinau kawotana; a kawotettaassi wurssetti baawa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Mary unto the angel, How shall this be, seeing I know not a man?
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaama kiitanchchaa, "Taani geela7o gidishin, hegee waanidi hananee?" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the angel answered and said unto her, The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee, and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee: therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchai zaaridi Mairaamo, "Geeshsha Ayyaanai ne bolli yaana; Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa wolqqai nenan shemppana; hegaa gishshau, ne yelana geeshsha na7ai Xoossaa Na7aa geetettana.

English Sentences: And, behold, thy cousin Elisabeth, she hath also conceived a son in her old age: and this is the sixth month with her, who was called barren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a; ne dabbiyaa Elssaabeexa ceeggikkonne attuma na7a shahaaraasu; asai beni o maine gees; shin a ha77i usuppun agina shahaara.

English Sentences: For with God nothing shall be impossible.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne Xoossaassi danddayettennabi bainna gishshaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Mary said, Behold the handmaid of the Lord; be it unto me according to thy word. And the angel departed from her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaama, "Taani Godaa ailliyo; ne qaalaadan, taassi hano" yaagaasu. Kiitanchchainne i matappe biis.

English Sentences: And Mary arose in those days, and went into the hill country with haste, into a city of Juda;
Wolaitta Sentences: Guutta gallassaappe guyyiyan, Mairaama denddada, deree dariyo Yihudaa giyo biittan de7iya issi katamaa eesuwan baasu.

English Sentences: And entered into the house of Zacharias, and saluted Elisabeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Zakkaariyaasa soo gelada, Elssaabeexo sarotaasu.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary, the babe leaped in her womb; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost:
Wolaitta Sentences: Elssaabeexa Mairaami sarotaa siyido wode, i uluwan de7iya na7ai qaaxxiis.

English Sentences: And she spake out with a loud voice, and said, Blessed art thou among women, and blessed is the fruit of thy womb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elssaabeexin Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin, qaalaa xoqqissada, "Neeni maccaasa ubban anjjettidaaro; ne uluwan de7iya na7ainne anjjettidaagaa;

English Sentences: And whence is this to me, that the mother of my Lord should come to me?
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni ta Godaa aayyiyaa taakko yaanau, hegaa mala bonchchoi taassi waanidi bessii?

English Sentences: For, lo, as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears, the babe leaped in my womb for joy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni saro giyo qaalan ta uluwan de7iya na7ai ufaissan qaaxxiis;

English Sentences: And blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai neeyyo odido qaalai polettanaagaa ammanidaara neeni anjjettidaaro" yaagada Mairaamissi odaasu.

English Sentences: And Mary said, My soul doth magnify the Lord,
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaama hagaadan yaagaasu; "Taani a ailliyaa tooshettidoogaa i be7ido gishshau, ta shemppoi Godaa bonchchees;

English Sentences: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.
Wolaitta Sentences: ta ayyaanaikka ta Xoossaa tana ashshiyaagan ufaittees.

English Sentences: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden: for, behold, from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a; wolqqaama Xoossai taassi daro gitabaa oottido gishshau, hachchippe sinttan tana asai ubbai anjjettidaaree yaagana.

English Sentences: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things; and holy is his name.
Wolaitta Sentences: A sunttai geeshsha.

English Sentences: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: I baassi yayyiya ubbaassi yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaashin, maarotettaa immees.

English Sentences: He hath shewed strength with his arm; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba kushiyan wolqqaama oosuwaa oottiis. Otoranchchata eta qofaara laaliis.

English Sentences: He hath put down the mighty from their seats, and exalted them of low degree.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawota kawotettaappe duge wottidi, ziqqan de7iyaageeta xoqqu oottiis.

English Sentences: He hath filled the hungry with good things; and the rich he hath sent empty away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Namisettidaageeta lo77obaa kalissidinne dureta mela kushe yedettiis.

English Sentences: He hath holpen his servant Israel, in remembrance of his mercy;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu aawatussi odidoogaadan, Abrahaamassinne a zariyaassi Xoossai maarotettaa merinau immanau hassayidi,

English Sentences: As he spake to our fathers, to Abraham, and to his seed for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: ailliyaa Israa7eela maaddiis" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Mary abode with her about three months, and returned to her own house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaama heezzu agina gidiyaagaa keenaa Elssaabeexi matan uttidoogaappe guyye baggan, ba soo simmaasu.

English Sentences: Now Elisabeth's full time came that she should be delivered; and she brought forth a son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elssaabeexissi yeliyo wodee gakkin, attuma na7aa yelaasu.

English Sentences: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her; and they rejoiced with her.
Wolaitta Sentences: I shoorotinne i dabboti Godai maarotettan iyyo oottido lo77obaa siyidi, iira ufaittidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child; and they called him Zacharias, after the name of his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hosppuntta gallassan, na7aa qaxxaranau yiidosona; a aawaa sunttaadan, Zakkaariyaasa giidi, sunttanau qoppidosona;

English Sentences: And his mother answered and said, Not so; but he shall be called John.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin a aayyiyaa zaarada, "CHii! Yohaannisa giidi sunttana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And they said unto her, There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaarettidi, "Ne dabboppe he sunttan xeesettiyai issoinne baawa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they made signs to his father, how he would have him called.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi, "Woigi sunttanee?" yaagidi, a aawaa biradhdhidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he asked for a writing table, and wrote, saying, His name is John. And they marvelled all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawai xaafiyoobaa oichchi ekkidi, "Na7aa sunttai Yohaannisa" giidi xaafin, ubbai garamettiis.

English Sentences: And his mouth was opened immediately, and his tongue loosed, and he spake, and praised God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara a doonai dooyettin, inxxarssai birshshettiis; Xoossaa anjjiiddi haasayiis.

English Sentences: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them: and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta shooro ubbai yayyiis; ha ubba yohoi deree dariyo Yihudaa biittaa ubban daro haasayettiis.

English Sentences: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts, saying, What manner of child shall this be! And the hand of the Lord was with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyida asai ubbai hegaa qoppiiddi, Xoossaa wolqqai a bolli de7iyoogaa erido gishshau, "Ha na7ai wode waananeeshsha?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost, and prophesied, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisa aawaa Zakkaariyaasan, Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin, hagaadan hananabaa yootiis;

English Sentences: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel; for he hath visited and redeemed his people,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba asaa maaddanau yiidi, eta wozido gishshau, Godai, Israa7eela Xoossai anjjetto.

English Sentences: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David;
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaseesappe de7iya hananabaa yootiya geeshshatu doonan haasayidoogaadan, ba ashkkaraa Daawita zariyaappe denttidi,

English Sentences: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets, which have been since the world began:
Wolaitta Sentences: nuna ashshiya wolqqaamaa nuukko kiittiis.

English Sentences: That we should be saved from our enemies, and from the hand of all that hate us;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai nu morkketuppenne nuna ixxiyaageetu ubbaa kushiyaappe nuna ashshees.

English Sentences: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers, and to remember his holy covenant;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan nu aawatussi maarotettaa immiis.

English Sentences: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham,
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu aawaa Abrahaamassi caaqqido caaquwaa geeshsha maachchaa qoppiis.

English Sentences: That he would grant unto us, that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aani nu morkketu kushiyaappe nuuni attidi,

English Sentences: In holiness and righteousness before him, all the days of our life.
Wolaitta Sentences: yayyennan nu de7uwaa wodiyaa ubban Xoossaa sinttan geeshshatettaaninne xillotettan ayyo oottanau, nuna danddayissiis.

English Sentences: And thou, child, shalt be called the prophet of the Highest: for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta na7au, neeni Godaa ogiyaa giigissanau appe sinttau biyo gishshau, Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaassi oottiya hananabaa yootiyaagaa geetettana.

English Sentences: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai eta nagaraa atto giyoogan a asai attanau danddayiyoogaa eta erissanau baasa.

English Sentences: Through the tender mercy of our God; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, nu Xoossaa maarotettainne qaretai daro gidiyo gishshau, saluwaa poo7uwaa i nu bollan poo7issana;

English Sentences: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, to guide our feet into the way of peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: he poo7oi nuna sarotaa ogiyaa kaalettanau, xumaaninne haiquwaa kuwan de7iyaageetussi poo7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the child grew, and waxed strong in spirit, and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guutta na7ai diccidi, ayyaanan minniis; Israa7eelatussi qoncciyan beettana gakkanaassi bazzuwan de7iis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in those days, that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus, that all the world should be taxed.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa sunttai xaafettana mala, Roome biittaa kawoi, Augisxxoosi azaziis.

English Sentences: (And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa sunttai koiro xaafettiyo wode, Qereneyoosi Sooriyaa biittaa haariyaagaa.

English Sentences: And all went to be taxed, every one into his own city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa ubbai huuphiyan huuphiyan xaafettanau, ba yelettido biittaa biis.

English Sentences: And Joseph also went up from Galilee, out of the city of Nazareth, into Judaea, unto the city of David, which is called Bethlehem; (because he was of the house and lineage of David:)
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi qassi Daawitantta keettanne zare gidido gishshau,

English Sentences: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife, being great with child.
Wolaitta Sentences: ayyo giigida Mairaamiira xaafettanau Galiilan de7iya Naazireete katamaappe Yihudaa biittan Beetaliheeme giyo Daawita katamaa issippe biis.

English Sentences: And so it was, that, while they were there, the days were accomplished that she should be delivered.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Mairaama shahaara; eti yan Beetaliheemen de7ishin, a yeliyo wodee gakkiis;

English Sentences: And she brought forth her firstborn son, and wrapped him in swaddling clothes, and laid him in a manger; because there was no room for them in the inn.
Wolaitta Sentences: ba baira na7aa yelaasu; imattai aqiyo keettan sohoi bainna gishshau, maayuwan na7aa xaaxada, miizzai kattaa wottin miyo qoriyan zin77issaasu.

English Sentences: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field, keeping watch over their flock by night.
Wolaitta Sentences: He deren dorssaa wudiyaa qamma heemmiiddi, dembban aqiya asati de7oosona.

English Sentences: And, lo, the angel of the Lord came upon them, and the glory of the Lord shone round about them: and they were sore afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa kiitanchchai etakko yiis; Godaa bonchchoi eta yuuyi aadhdhidi poo7iis. Eti daro yayyin,

English Sentences: And the angel said unto them, Fear not: for, behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy, which shall be to all people.
Wolaitta Sentences: kiitanchchai eta, "Hachchi Godai Kiristtoosi,

English Sentences: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: ashshiyaagee Daawita kataman yelettidoogaassi taani asa ubbaa ufaissiya mishiraachchuwaa intteyyo odiyo gishshau, yayyoppite;

English Sentences: And this shall be a sign unto you; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes, lying in a manger.
Wolaitta Sentences: maayuwan xaaxettida gacino na7ai miizzai kattaa wottin miyo qoriyan zin77idaagaa demmanaagee intteyyo malaata gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God, and saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Akeekennan he kiitanchchaara daro saluwaa kiitanchchati kiyidi beettidosona.

English Sentences: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa galatiiddi, "Salo ubbaappe bolla saluwan de7iya Xoossaassi bonchchoi gido. Sa7an a ufaissiya asaassi sarotettai gido" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as the angels were gone away from them into heaven, the shepherds said one to another, Let us now go even unto Bethlehem, and see this thing which is come to pass, which the Lord hath made known unto us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchati etappe shaahettidi, saluwaa biichchidaashin, dorssaa heemmiyaageeti bantta giddon, "Ane Beetaliheeme gakkanaashin biidi, Xoossai nuussi odido yohoi hanidaagaa be7oos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they came with haste, and found Mary, and Joseph, and the babe lying in a manger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesuwan yiidi, Mairaamonne Yooseefa demmidi, miizzai kattaa wottin miyo qoriyan gacino na7ai zin77idaagaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: And when they had seen it, they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti be7ido kiitanchchai ha guutta na7aabaa etassi odidoogaa erissidosona.

English Sentences: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa siyida ubbai dorssaa heemmiyaageeti odido yohuwan garamettiis.

English Sentences: But Mary kept all these things, and pondered them in her heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mairaama qassi ha ubba yohuwaa ba wozanaa giddon wottada, qoppaidda de7ausu.

English Sentences: And the shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen, as it was told unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssaa heemmiyaageeti kase etassi kiitanchchai yootidoogaadan hanin, siyido ubbaa gishshaunne be7ido ubbaa gishshau, Xoossaa galatiiddinne bonchchiiddi simmidosona.

English Sentences: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child, his name was called JESUS, which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hosppun gallassaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi qaxxarettiyo wodee gakkin, Mairaama a yelanau shahaaranaappe kase kiitanchchai a sunttidoogaadan, a sunttai Yesuusa geetettiis.

English Sentences: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished, they brought him to Jerusalem, to present him to the Lord;
Wolaitta Sentences: Muuse higgee azaziyoogaadan, Mairaamissinne Yooseefassi geeyiyo wodee gakkin,

English Sentences: (As it is written in the law of the LORD, Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord;)
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa higgee, "Baira yelettida attuma ubbai Godaassi dummatidaagaa geetetto" g iidoogaadan, Godaassi Yesuusa immanau Yerusalaame efiidosona.

English Sentences: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord, A pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Godaa higgee, "Naa77u buuba haraphpheta woikko naa77u mara haraphpheta" giidoogaadan, Godaassi yarshshuwaa yarshshanau efiidosona.

English Sentences: And, behold, there was a man in Jerusalem, whose name was Simeon; and the same man was just and devout, waiting for the consolation of Israel: and the Holy Ghost was upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaamen Simoona giyo bitanee de7ees; i Xoossau yayyiya xillo asa; qassi Israa7eelati attiyo wodiyaa naagiiddi de7ees.

English Sentences: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost, that he should not see death, before he had seen the Lord's Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, Geeshsha Ayyaanai a bolli de7iyaagee, "Godai tiyido Kiristtoosa be7ennan haiqqakka" yaagidi, a erissi wottiis.

English Sentences: And he came by the Spirit into the temple: and when the parents brought in the child Jesus, to do for him after the custom of the law,
Wolaitta Sentences: Simooni ayyaanai kaalettin, Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliis. Aayyiyaanne aawai higgee azaziyoogaadan, guutta na7aa Yesuusa Beeta Maqidasiyaa ehin,

English Sentences: Then took he him up in his arms, and blessed God, and said,
Wolaitta Sentences: Simooni he na7aa idimmidi, Xoossaa galatiiddi yaagiis.

English Sentences: Lord, now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace, according to thy word:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ubbaa Haariya Godau,

English Sentences: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation,
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni asa ubbaa sinttan giigissido ne ashettaa taani ta aifiyan be7ido gishshau, ha77i ne qaalaadan,

English Sentences: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people;
Wolaitta Sentences: taani ne aillee sarotan haiqqana.

English Sentences: A light to lighten the Gentiles, and the glory of thy people Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: He ashettai Israa7eela gidenna asau nebaa bessiya poo7o mala; qassi ne asaa Israa7eelassi bonchcho" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefinne Mairaama Simooni Yesuusabaa odidoogan garamettidosona.

English Sentences: And Simeon blessed them, and said unto Mary his mother, Behold, this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel; and for a sign which shall be spoken against;
Wolaitta Sentences: Simooni eta anjjiis; anjjidi a aayyiyo Mairaamo, "Israa7eelan de7iya darotu kunddettaassinne dendduwaassi a ixissiyaageetussi Xoossaappe malaata gidanau,

English Sentences: (Yea, a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also,) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi darota wozanan de7iya geemmida qofai qonccana mala, ha na7ai Xoossaappe doorettiis. Ne wozanaakka qara bisuwaadan, qaretai qanxxana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And there was one Anna, a prophetess, the daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Aser: she was of a great age, and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aseera zerettaappe yelettida Panu7eela na7iyaa Haanna hananabaa yootiyaaro. A ba geela7otetta azinaara laappun laittaa de7aasu.

English Sentences: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years, which departed not from the temple, but served God with fastings and prayers night and day.
Wolaitta Sentences: I azinai haiqqin, hosppun tammanne oiddu laittaa azina gelennan de7aasu. A daro cima; qassi xoomaiddanne woossaidda gallassinne qammi Xoossau goinnaasu; Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kiyennan de7aasu.

English Sentences: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord, and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: He saatiyankka shiiqada, Xoossaa galataasu. Qassi Xoossai Yerusalaame wozin be7ana yaagidi naagiya asaa ubbau na7aabaa odaasu.

English Sentences: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord, they returned into Galilee, to their own city Nazareth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Godaa higgee azazidoogaadan, ubbabaa polidoogaappe guyye baggan, Galiila biittan de7iya Naazireete giyo bantta katamaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And the child grew, and waxed strong in spirit, filled with wisdom: and the grace of God was upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7ai diccidi minniis; aadhdhida eratettai aani kumiis; ayyaanan minniis; Xoossaa aaro kehatettai a bolli de7ees.

English Sentences: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa aayyiyaanne aawai laittan laittan, Paasikaa gallassaa bonchchiyo wode, Yerusalaame boosona.

English Sentences: And when he was twelve years old, they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast.
Wolaitta Sentences: I yelettoosappe tammanne naa77u laitta gidin, haroodeegaadankka Yerusalaame biidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had fulfilled the days, as they returned, the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paasikaa gallassaa bonchchiyo wodee wurin, eti guyye bantta soo simuwaa doommidosona; shin Yesuusi so asai erennan Yerusalaamen attiis.

English Sentences: But they, supposing him to have been in the company, went a day's journey; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ogiyaa asaara issippe de7ees giiddi, issi gallassa ogiyaa biidosona. Bantta dabbuwaa giddooninne eriyo asaa giddon a koyidosona.

English Sentences: And when they found him not, they turned back again to Jerusalem, seeking him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xayin a koyiiddi, Yerusalaame simmidi,

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that after three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the doctors, both hearing them, and asking them questions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissiyaageetuppe siyiiddinne eta oichchiiddi eta giddon uttidaagaa heezzantto gallassaappe guyyiyan demmidosona.

English Sentences: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers.
Wolaitta Sentences: A doonaappe kiyiyaabaa siyida ubbai i immiyo era zaaruwan garamettiis.

English Sentences: And when they saw him, they were amazed: and his mother said unto him, Son, why hast thou thus dealt with us? behold, thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aayyiyaanne aawai a be7idi garamettidosona. Mairaama, "Ta na7au, nuna aissi hagaadan oottadii? Ne aawainne taani nena koyiiddi, daro tuggatida" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, How is it that ye sought me? wist ye not that I must be about my Father's business?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Tana aissi koyidetii? Taani ta Aawaa keettan de7anau bessiyoogaa erekketii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i giidobaa eti akeekibookkona.

English Sentences: And he went down with them, and came to Nazareth, and was subject unto them: but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etaara duge Naazireete biis. Yan etassi azazettees. Mairaama ha ubba yohuwaa ba wozanan wottausu.

English Sentences: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favour with God and man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi aadhdhida eratettaaranne geesaara dicciiddi, Xoossaaninne asan sabettiis.

English Sentences: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea, and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee, and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis, and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xibaariyoosi, Roome biittaa kawoi kawotido tammanne ichchashantta laittan, PHenxxeniyaa PHilaaxoosi Yihudaa haariyo wode, Heeroodisi Galiila haarees; a ishai Piliphphoosi, Ixuriyaasanne Xiraakonidoosa biittaa haarees; Lisaaniyoosikka Abilaaniisa biittaa haarees.

English Sentences: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests, the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haanninne Qayaafi qeese halaqa. He wode bazzon de7iya Zakkaariyaasa na7aa, Yohaannisakko Xoossaa qaalai yiis.

English Sentences: And he came into all the country about Jordan, preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa heera biittaa ubban, "Intte nagaraa atto gaanaassi, nagaraappe simmidi xammaqettite" yaagidi yootiis.

English Sentences: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet, saying, The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, make his paths straight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi ba maxaafan hagaadan xaafiis; "Issoi bazzon ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Godaa ogiyaa giigissite. I hemettana loossuwaakka ayyo sitti oottite.

English Sentences: Every valley shall be filled, and every mountain and hill shall be brought low; and the crooked shall be made straight, and the rough ways shall be made smooth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Gisa biitta ubbai kumana. Dereenne kerai ubbai baasettidi giigana. Geella ogee sitta gidana. Moorettida ogee salallana.

English Sentences: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai Xoossai ashshiyoogaa be7ana giis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him, O generation of vipers, who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yohaannisi banan xammaqettana giidi yiida asaa, "Ha shooshshatoo, Xoossaa hanqqoi yaana haniyaagaappe baqatana mala, intteyyo oonee odidai?

English Sentences: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance, and begin not to say within yourselves, We have Abraham to our father: for I say unto you, That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte nagaraappe simmidoogaa erissiyaabaa oottite. Abrahaami nu aawaa giidi, intte giddon haasayanau doommoppite. Aissi giikko, Xoossai ha shuchchata Abrahaamassi na7a kessanaukka danddayees yaagada, taani inttessi odais.

English Sentences: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees: every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beexee mittaa xaphuwan qanxxanau giigi uttiis. Simmi lo77o aifiyaa aifenna mitta ubbai qanxxettidi, taman yegettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the people asked him, saying, What shall we do then?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaatin nu ai oottanee?" yaagidi, daro asai a oichchiis.

English Sentences: He answereth and saith unto them, He that hath two coats, let him impart to him that hath none; and he that hath meat, let him do likewise.
Wolaitta Sentences: I asaassi zaaridi, "Naa77u qolee de7iyo urai issi qoliyaa aibinne bainna urau immo; qumai de7iyo uraikka hegaadan ootto" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then came also publicans to be baptized, and said unto him, Master, what shall we do?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaraxaa shiishshiyaageeti xammaqettanau yiidi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, nuuni ai oottanee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Exact no more than that which is appointed you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Higgee azaziyoogaappe aattidi, ekkoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him, saying, And what shall we do? And he said unto them, Do violence to no man, neither accuse any falsely; and be content with your wages.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wotaaddarati, "Qassi nuuni ai oottanee?" yaagidi a oichchidosona. Oichchin, "Wolqqan dafidi, woi wordduwan mootidi, ooppenne miishsha ekkoppite. Intte damoozai intteyyo gidana yaagidi, ufaittidi de7ite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as the people were in expectation, and all men mused in their hearts of John, whether he were the Christ, or not;
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Godai tiyido Kiristtoosa naagiiddinne Yohaannisabaa bantta wozanaa giddon qoppiiddi, "Hagee Kiristtoosa gidennan aggenna" yaagidi, a mali wottidaashin,

English Sentences: John answered, saying unto them all, I indeed baptize you with water; but one mightier than I cometh, the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose: he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi eta ubbaassi zaaridi, "Taani inttena haattan xammaqais; shin taappe wolqqaamiyaagee yees. Taani a caammaa qashuwaa birshshanaukka bessikke. I inttena Geeshsha Ayyaanaaninne taman xammaqana.

English Sentences: Whose fan is in his hand, and he will throughly purge his floor, and will gather the wheat into his garner; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable.
Wolaitta Sentences: A kushiyan kattaa suraggiyo laidai de7ees. Kattaa qoxxidi, audiyaappe geeshshidi pittees; gisttiyaa gootaran qolees; shin dalaa to7enna taman xuuggana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yohaannisi asaa daro dumma zoriyaa zoriiddi, wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa asau yootees;

English Sentences: But Herod the tetrarch, being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip's wife, and for all the evils which Herod had done,
Wolaitta Sentences: shin deriyaa haariya Heeroodisi ba ishaa machchiyo Heeroodiyaado ekkido gishshaunne hara iitabaa oottido gishshau, Yohaannisi a hanqqettidi seeriis.

English Sentences: Added yet this above all, that he shut up John in prison.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa ubbaa bolli hara iitabaa gujjidi, Heeroodisi Yohaannisa qasho keettaa gelissiis.

English Sentences: Now when all the people were baptized, it came to pass, that Jesus also being baptized, and praying, the heaven was opened,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubba asai xammaqettidoogaappe guyye baggan, Yesuusi qassi xammaqettiis. I woossishin, saloi dooyettiis.

English Sentences: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him, and a voice came from heaven, which said, Thou art my beloved Son; in thee I am well pleased.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshsha Ayyaanai haraphphe milatiiddi, a bolli wodhdhiis. Qassi saluwaappe, "Taani siiqiyo ta Na7ai nena; tana nebai ufaissees" yaagiya qaalai yiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age, being (as was supposed) the son of Joseph, which was the son of Heli,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi yelettoosappe hasttamu laitta keena gidishin, tamaarissanau doommiis.

English Sentences: Which was the son of Matthat, which was the son of Levi, which was the son of Melchi, which was the son of Janna, which was the son of Joseph,
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai a Yooseefa na7aa yaagidi qoppiis.

English Sentences: Which was the son of Mattathias, which was the son of Amos, which was the son of Naum, which was the son of Esli, which was the son of Nagge,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi Eela na7aa; Eeli Maaxaata na7aa; Maaxaati Leewa na7aa; Leewi Milkka na7aa; Milkki Yoona na7aa; Yooni Yooseefa na7aa; Yooseefi Maataatiyu na7aa; Maataatiyu Amoxa na7aa; Amoxi Naahooma na7aa; Naahoomi Esiliima na7aa; Esiliimi Naage na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Maath, which was the son of Mattathias, which was the son of Semei, which was the son of Joseph, which was the son of Juda,
Wolaitta Sentences: Naagee Maa7ata na7aa; Maa7ati Maataatiyu na7aa; Maataatiyu Seemeya na7aa; Seemeyi Yooseefa na7aa; Yooseefi Yooda na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Joanna, which was the son of Rhesa, which was the son of Zorobabel, which was the son of Salathiel, which was the son of Neri,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoodi Yoonaana na7aa; Yoonaani Reesa na7aa; Reesi Zarubaabeela na7aa; Zarubaabeeli Salaatiyaala na7aa; Salaatiyaali Neera na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Melchi, which was the son of Addi, which was the son of Cosam, which was the son of Elmodam, which was the son of Er,
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeri Milkka na7aa; Milkki Hada na7aa; Hadi Yoosaasa na7aa; Yoosaasi Qosaama na7aa; Qosaami Elmmodaama na7aa; Elmmodaami Eera na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Jose, which was the son of Eliezer, which was the son of Jorim, which was the son of Matthat, which was the son of Levi,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eeri Yoosee7a na7aa; Yoosee7i El77eezara na7aa; El77eezari Yoraama na7aa; Yoraami Maaxaata na7aa; Maaxaati Leewa na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Simeon, which was the son of Juda, which was the son of Joseph, which was the son of Jonan, which was the son of Eliakim,
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewi Simoona na7aa; Simooni Yihudaa na7aa; Yihudai Yooseefa na7aa; Yooseefi Yoonaana na7aa; Yoonaani Eliyaaqiima na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Melea, which was the son of Menan, which was the son of Mattatha, which was the son of Nathan, which was the son of David,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eliyaaqiimi Meliyaa na7aa; Melee Mainaana na7aa; Mainaani Maaxaata na7aa; Maaxaati Naataana na7aa; Naataani Daawita na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Jesse, which was the son of Obed, which was the son of Booz, which was the son of Salmon, which was the son of Naasson,
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Isseya na7aa; Isseyi Yobeeda na7aa; Yobeedi Boo7eeza na7aa; Boo7eezi Salimoona na7aa; Salimooni Na7asoona na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Aminadab, which was the son of Aram, which was the son of Esrom, which was the son of Phares, which was the son of Juda,
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7asooni Aminadaaba na7aa; Aminadaabi Raama na7aa; Raami Arnna na7aa; Arnni Hexiroona na7aa; Hexirooni Paareesa na7aa; Paareesi Yihudaa na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Jacob, which was the son of Isaac, which was the son of Abraham, which was the son of Thara, which was the son of Nachor,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai Yaaqooba na7aa; Yaaqoobi Yisaaqa na7aa; Yisaaqi Abrahaama na7aa; Abrahaami Taara na7aa; Taari Naakoora na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Saruch, which was the son of Ragau, which was the son of Phalec, which was the son of Heber, which was the son of Sala,
Wolaitta Sentences: Naakoori Saruuga na7aa; Saruugi Raa7u na7aa; Raa7u Peeleega na7aa; Peeleegi Ebeera na7aa; Ebeeri SHeela na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Cainan, which was the son of Arphaxad, which was the son of Sem, which was the son of Noe, which was the son of Lamech,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHeeli Qainiima na7aa; Qainiimi Arifaakisaada na7aa; Arifaakisaadi Seema na7aa; Seemi Nohe na7aa; Nohee Laameeka na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Mathusala, which was the son of Enoch, which was the son of Jared, which was the son of Maleleel, which was the son of Cainan,
Wolaitta Sentences: Laameeki Maatusaala na7aa; Maatusaali Heenooka na7aa; Heenooki Yaareeda na7aa; Yaareedi Malaali7eela na7aa; Malaali7eeli Qainaana na7aa;

English Sentences: Which was the son of Enos, which was the son of Seth, which was the son of Adam, which was the son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qainaani Heenoosa na7aa; Heenoosi Seeta na7aa; Seeti Addaame na7aa; Addaamee Xoossaa na7aa.

English Sentences: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi, Yorddaanoosappe simmiis.

English Sentences: Being forty days tempted of the devil. And in those days he did eat nothing: and when they were ended, he afterward hungered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ayyaanai kaalettin, bazzo biidi, oitamu gallassaa xalahe halaqan paacettiis. He gallassatun ainne quma mibeenna gishshau, oitamu gallassaappe guyyiyan namisettiis.

English Sentences: And the devil said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, command this stone that it be made bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xalahe halaqai a, "Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidikko ha shuchchaa, Oitta gida gaada azaza" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered him, saying, It is written, That man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Xoossaa maxaafai, Asi Xoossaa qaalaa ubban de7anaappe attin, oitta xalaalan de7enna yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the devil, taking him up into an high mountain, shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xalahe halaqai a gita deriyaa huuphiyaa kessidi, sa7aa kawotettaa ubbaa issi kuttan bessiis.

English Sentences: And the devil said unto him, All this power will I give thee, and the glory of them: for that is delivered unto me; and to whomsoever I will I give it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xalahe halaqai, "Ha wolqqa ubbainne bonchchoi taassi imettido gishshau, taani dosiyo oossinne immana; neessikka immana.

English Sentences: If thou therefore wilt worship me, all shall be thine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, neeni taassi goinnikko, ha ubbai neessi gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto him, Get thee behind me, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Xoossaa maxaafai, Godau, ne Xoossau goinna; a xalaalau ootta yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he brought him to Jerusalem, and set him on a pinnacle of the temple, and said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, cast thyself down from hence:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xalahe halaqai Yesuusa Yerusalaame efiidi, Beeta Maqidasiyaa xeeraa kessidi, "Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidikko, ane duge guppa.

English Sentences: For it is written, He shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossaa maxaafai, Xoossai nena naagana mala, ba kiitanchchata azazana qassi

English Sentences: And in their hands they shall bear thee up, lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne tohoi shuchchan xubettenna mala, bantta kushiyan nena denttana yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering said unto him, It is said, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi a, "Qassikka Xoossaa maxaafai, Godaa ne Xoossaa paaccoppa yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the devil had ended all the temptation, he departed from him for a season.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xalahe halaqai Yesuusa paacciyoogaa ubbaa wurssidoogaappe guyye baggan, ha77issau appe shaahettiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee: and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Ayyaanaa wolqqan Galiila simmiis. Abai hegaa heeran de7iya biitta ubban odettiis.

English Sentences: And he taught in their synagogues, being glorified of all.
Wolaitta Sentences: I bantta Aihuda woosa keettatun tamaarissiiddi, ubban galatettiis. Yesuusi ba diccido Naazireete katamaa yiis.

English Sentences: And he came to Nazareth, where he had been brought up: and, as his custom was, he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and stood up for to read.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haroodeegaadan Sambbata gallassan Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi, nabbabanau denddiis.

English Sentences: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias. And when he had opened the book, he found the place where it was written,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasan xaafettidi xaaxettida maxaafaa ayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me, because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted, to preach deliverance to the captives, and recovering of sight to the blind, to set at liberty them that are bruised,
Wolaitta Sentences: He maxaafaa dooyidi, "Taani hiyyeesaassi lo77o mishiraachchuwaa yootanau tiyettido gishshau, Godaa Ayyaanai ta bollan de7ees. Qashettidaageetussi birshshettiyoogaa, qooqetussi xeelliyoogaa yootana mala,

English Sentences: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi qohettidaageeta qohuwaappe kessana mala, dosettida Godaa laittaa yootana mala, tana kiittiis" geetettidi, xaafettida sohuwaa demmiis.

English Sentences: And he closed the book, and he gave it again to the minister, and sat down. And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maxaafaa xaaxidi, Aihuda woosa keettan naagiyaagaassi immidi uttiis. Aihuda woosa keettan de7iya asai a akeekidi xeellees.

English Sentences: And he began to say unto them, This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etassi haasayanau doommidi, "Hachchi nabbabettin, intte siyiyo wode, ha Xoossaa maxaafai giidoogee polettiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth. And they said, Is not this Joseph's son?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbai ayyo markkattidosona. A doonaappe kiyiya aaro kehatettaa qaalaa garamettidi, "Hagee Yooseefa na7aa gidennee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Ye will surely say unto me this proverb, Physician, heal thyself: whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum, do also here in thy country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Intte taassi, Xaliyaa godau, ne huuphiyaa patta yaagiyo leemisuwaa yootanaagaa taani geeshshada erais. Qassi, Neeni Qifirinaahooma kataman oottidoogaa nuuni siyida; hegaadan hagan ne biittan ootta yaagidi, intte taassi yootana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Verily I say unto you, No prophet is accepted in his own country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka hagaadan yaagiis; "Tumaa gais; hananabaa yootiyaagee ba biittan bonchchetti erenna.

English Sentences: But I tell you of a truth, many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias, when the heaven was shut up three years and six months, when great famine was throughout all the land;
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin taani intteyyo tumaa gais; Eelaasa wodiyan heezzu laittanne usuppun agina gakkanaashin, saloi gorddettin, sa7an ubban wolqqaama koshai geliis. Gelido wode, Israa7eelan daro am77e maccaasati de7oosona.

English Sentences: But unto none of them was Elias sent, save unto Sarepta, a city of Sidon, unto a woman that was a widow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eelaasi Sidoona biittan de7iya Siraafita giyo kataman issi am77e maccaaseekko kiitettoorippe attin, etappe ookkonne kiitettibeenna.

English Sentences: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet; and none of them was cleansed, saving Naaman the Syrian.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya Elssaa7a wodiyan Israa7eelan daro inchchirichchaa harggiya asai de7ees. Sooriyaa Naa7imaanappe attin, etappe harai issoinne paxibeenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all they in the synagogue, when they heard these things, were filled with wrath,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihuda woosa keettan de7iya ubbai hegaa siyidi, daro hanqqettidosona.

English Sentences: And rose up, and thrust him out of the city, and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built, that they might cast him down headlong.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti denddidi, katamaappe Yesuusa gaxaa efiidosona. Efiidi kakaara duge olanau katamai keexettido deriyaa huuphiyaa a kessidosona.

English Sentences: But he passing through the midst of them went his way,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i eta gidduwaara kanttidi biis.

English Sentences: And came down to Capernaum, a city of Galilee, and taught them on the sabbath days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Galiilan Qifirinaahooma giyo katamaa wodhdhidi, Yesuusi Sambbatan asaa tamaarissees.

English Sentences: And they were astonished at his doctrine: for his word was with power.
Wolaitta Sentences: A qaalai alaafetettai de7iyo asa qaala mala gidido gishshau, asai a timirttiyaa siyidi garamettiis.

English Sentences: And in the synagogue there was a man, which had a spirit of an unclean devil, and cried out with a loud voice,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihuda woosa keettan iita ayyaanai de7iyo bitanee ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi,

English Sentences: Saying, Let us alone; what have we to do with thee, thou Jesus of Nazareth? art thou come to destroy us? I know thee who thou art; the Holy One of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hai aggarkkii; Naazireeta Yesuusaa, neeni nuuppe ai koyai? Nuna xaissanau yaadii? Neeni oonakko erais; neeni Xoossaa geeshshaa gidikkii!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus rebuked him, saying, Hold thy peace, and come out of him. And when the devil had thrown him in the midst, he came out of him, and hurt him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he iita ayyaanaa, "Haizza; bitaniyaappe kiya" yaagidi azaziis. Iita ayyaanai a eta matan gufantti yeggidi, ainne qohennan bitaniyaappe kiyi aggiis.

English Sentences: And they were all amazed, and spake among themselves, saying, What a word is this! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits, and they come out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbai garamettidi bantta giddon, "Hagee aiba qaalee? Alaafetettaaninne wolqqan iita ayyaanata azazees; qassi appe kiyidi boosona" yaagidi haasayidosona.

English Sentences: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusabai hegaa heeran de7iya biitta ubbaa gakki aggiis.

English Sentences: And he arose out of the synagogue, and entered into Simon's house. And Simon's wife's mother was taken with a great fever; and they besought him for her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Aihuda woosa keettaappe denddidi, Simoona soo biis. Biyo wode, Simoona bollotiyaa wolqqaama qoxuwaanne mishuwaa harggada zin77idaaribaa Yesuusayyo yootidosona.

English Sentences: And he stood over her, and rebuked the fever; and it left her: and immediately she arose and ministered unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: I matan eqqidi, qoxuwaanne mishuwaa agga gin, mishoinne qoxoi o aggiis. Sohuwaara denddada etayyo ootta aggaasu.

English Sentences: Now when the sun was setting, all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him; and he laid his hands on every one of them, and healed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dumma dumma harggiyan ohettida asaa ubbaa awai wullin, akko ehiidosona. Ba kushiyaa eta ubbaa bolli huuphiyan huuphiyan wottidi, ubbaa pattiis.

English Sentences: And devils also came out of many, crying out, and saying, Thou art Christ the Son of God. And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak: for they knew that he was Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pattin xalaheti qassi, "Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa Kiristtoosa gidikkii!" yaagidi waassiiddi, daro asaappe kiyidosona. I Kiristtoosa gididoogaa eti erido gishshau, haasayennaadan Yesuusi eta seeridi diggiis.

English Sentences: And when it was day, he departed and went into a desert place: and the people sought him, and came unto him, and stayed him, that he should not depart from them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttin kiyidi, asi bainnasaa biis. Asai a koyiiddi, akko yiis. I eta matappe beenna mala, digganau koyidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also: for therefore am I sent.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i, "Taani hara kataman de7iya asaukka Xoossaa kawotettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootanau bessees. Aissi giikko, Xoossai tana kiittidoogee hegaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi, Galiilan de7iya Aihuda woosa keettatun yootiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God, he stood by the lake of Gennesaret,
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Xoossaa qaalaa Yesuusappe siyiiddi a sugin, Yesuusi Genssereexa abbaa lanqqiyan eqqiis.

English Sentences: And saw two ships standing by the lake: but the fishermen were gone out of them, and were washing their nets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eqqidi abbaa lanqqiyan de7iya naa77u wolwoluwaa be7iis. Hegan moliyaa oiqqiyaageeti wolwoluwaappe kiyidi, bantta gitiyaa meeccoosona.

English Sentences: And he entered into one of the ships, which was Simon's, and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land. And he sat down, and taught the people out of the ship.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wolwolotuppe issuwan, Simoonaagan gelidi, "Ha wolwoluwaa abbaa lanqqiyaappe guuttiyo giddokko shiishsha" yaagidi Simoona woossiis. He wolwoluwaa giddon uttidi, deriyaa tamaarissiis.

English Sentences: Now when he had left speaking, he said unto Simon, Launch out into the deep, and let down your nets for a draught.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haasayaa wurssidoogaappe guyye baggan Simoona, "Ciimmatiya sohuwaa shiiqa; moliyaa oiqqanau intte gitiyaa haattan yeggite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Simon answering said unto him, Master, we have toiled all the night, and have taken nothing: nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simooni zaaridi, "Godau, qamma ubbaa daafuridi, ainne oiqqibookko; shin ha77i ne qaalaadan gitiyaa yeggais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they had this done, they inclosed a great multitude of fishes: and their net brake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeggidoogaappe guyye baggan, keehi daro moliyaa oiqqin, gitee daahettana haniis.

English Sentences: And they beckoned unto their partners, which were in the other ship, that they should come and help them. And they came, and filled both the ships, so that they began to sink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etaara issippe oottiya hara wolwoluwan de7iyaageeti yiidi banttana maaddana mala, eta wuttin, yiidi naa77u wolwoluwaakka haattai mittana gakkanaashin, moliyaa kunttidosona.

English Sentences: When Simon Peter saw it, he fell down at Jesus' knees, saying, Depart from me; for I am a sinful man, O Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Simoon PHeexiroosi hegaa be7ido wode, Yesuusa tohuwan kunddidi, "Godau, taani nagaranchcha gidido gishshau, taappe shaahetta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For he was astonished, and all that were with him, at the draught of the fishes which they had taken:
Wolaitta Sentences: Simooninne aara de7iya hara asai ubbai bantta oiqqido daro moliyaa be7idi, garamettidosona.

English Sentences: And so was also James, and John, the sons of Zebedee, which were partners with Simon. And Jesus said unto Simon, Fear not; from henceforth thou shalt catch men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka Simoonaara issippe oottiyaageeti, Zabddiyoosa naati, Yaaqoobinne Yohaannisi garamettidosona. Garamettin Yesuusi Simoona, "Yayyoppa; hagaappe sinttan neeni asa oiqqiyaagaa gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they had brought their ships to land, they forsook all, and followed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wolwolota haattaappe gaxaa kessidoogaappe guyye baggan, ubbabaa aggi bayidi, Yesuusa kaallidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when he was in a certain city, behold a man full of leprosy: who seeing Jesus fell on his face, and besought him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi katamatuppe issinnen de7ishin, issi inchchirichchai bolla ubban kumido bitanee Yesuusakko yiidi, a be7idi, a sinttan gulbbatidi, "Godau, neeni koyikko, tana pattanau danddayaasa" yaagidi woossiis.

English Sentences: And he put forth his hand, and touched him, saying, I will: be thou clean. And immediately the leprosy departed from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba kushiyaa yeddidi, a bochchidi, "Taani koyais; paxa!" yaagin, sohuwaarakka inchchirichchai bitaniyaa yeddi aggiis.

English Sentences: And he charged him to tell no man: but go, and shew thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing, according as Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi a, "Hagaa oossinne yootoppa; shin qeesiyaakko baada ne bollaa a bessa; neeni geeshsha gididoogaa asaa erissanau Muusee azazidoogaadankka yarshshuwaa yarshsha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him: and great multitudes came together to hear, and to be healed by him of their infirmities.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusabai daro sohuwaa gakkiyo wode, cora asai i odiyoogaa siyanaunne bantta harggiyaappe paxanau shiiqoosona.

English Sentences: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness, and prayed.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi asi bainnasaa biidi woossees.

English Sentences: And it came to pass on a certain day, as he was teaching, that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by, which were come out of every town of Galilee, and Judaea, and Jerusalem: and the power of the Lord was present to heal them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi, Yesuusi tamaarissishin, Galiilaaninne Yihudan de7iya katamaa ubbaappenne Yerusalaameppe yiida Parisaawetinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti he sohuwan uttidosona. Yesuusi hargganchchata pattana mala, Godaa wolqqai a bolli de7ees.

English Sentences: And, behold, men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy: and they sought means to bring him in, and to lay him before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amarida asati bollai silido issi bitaniyaa halan tookkidi, Yesuusakko ehiidosona; ehiidi, soo gelissanaunne Yesuusa sinttan a wottanau koyidosona.

English Sentences: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude, they went upon the housetop, and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai darido gishshau, soo a gelissanau etassi ogee xayin, keettaa huuphiyaa kiyidi, kaaraa lukkidi, bitaniyaa a halaara duge yeddidi, Yesuusa sinttan de7iya asaa giddon wottidosona.

English Sentences: And when he saw their faith, he said unto him, Man, thy sins are forgiven thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta ammanuwaa be7idi, "Bitaniyau, ne nagarai atto geetettiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason, saying, Who is this which speaketh blasphemies? Who can forgive sins, but God alone?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti, "Laa hagee Xoossaa bolli iitabaa haasayiyaagee oonee? Xoossaa xalaalaappe attin, harai ooni nagara atto gaanau danddayii?" yaagidi, bantta giddon qofaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts, he answering said unto them, What reason ye in your hearts?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta qofaa eridi, "Intte intte wozanan hagaadan aissi qoppeetii?

English Sentences: Whether is easier, to say, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Rise up and walk?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne nagarai atto geetettiis giyoogee mateeyye woi Dendda eqqada hemetta giyoogee matee?

English Sentences: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins, (he said unto the sick of the palsy,) I say unto thee, Arise, and take up thy couch, and go into thine house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi sa7aa bollan nagara atto gaanau taayyo Asa Na7aayyo alaafetettai de7iyoogaa taani inttena bessana" yaagidi, bollai silido bitaniyaa, "Nena gais; dendda eqqa. Yaatada ne halaa tookkada ne soo ba" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And immediately he rose up before them, and took up that whereon he lay, and departed to his own house, glorifying God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara eta sinttan denddi eqqidi, ba zin77ido halaa tookkidi, Xoossaa galatiiddi, ba soo biis.

English Sentences: And they were all amazed, and they glorified God, and were filled with fear, saying, We have seen strange things to day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bin eti ubbai, garamettidosona. Daro yayyidi, "Hachchi nuuni oorattabaa be7ida" yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona.

English Sentences: And after these things he went forth, and saw a publican, named Levi, sitting at the receipt of custom: and he said unto him, Follow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi kiyidi, giiraa ekkiya Leewa giyoogee giiraa ekkiyo ba sohuwan uttidaagaa demmidi, "Tana kaalla" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he left all, rose up, and followed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Leewi ubbabaa aggi bayidi, denddi eqqidi, a kaalliis.

English Sentences: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house: and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewi ba son Yesuusa mokkanau daro imatuwaa makkiis. Hegan giiraa ekkiyaageetinne hara asai etaara issippe uttidosona.

English Sentences: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples, saying, Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners?
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaawetinne higgiyaa tamaarissiya, etaara oottiyaageeti, "Giiraa ekkiyaageetuuranne nagaranchchatuura intte aissi issippe meetii? Qassi aissi issippe uyeetii?" yaagidi, Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratu bolli zuuzummidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering said unto them, They that are whole need not a physician; but they that are sick.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Hargganchchatuppe attin, payyatuyyo aakimee koshshenna.

English Sentences: I came not to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nagaranchchati bantta nagaraappe simmanaadan, eta xeesanau yiidoogaappe attin, xillota xeesanau yabeikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said unto him, Why do the disciples of John fast often, and make prayers, and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees; but thine eat and drink?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yesuusa, "Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati daro wode xoomoosona; woossoosona; qassi Parisaaweti erissiyo ashkkaratikka hegaadan oottoosona. SHin ne erissiyo ashkkarati moosona, uyoosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast, while the bridegroom is with them?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Bullachchaa yiida asata machchiyo ekkiyaagee etaara de7ishin, xoomissanau danddayeetii? Danddayekketa;

English Sentences: But the days will come, when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them, and then shall they fast in those days.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin machchiyo ekkiyaagaa eta matappe efaana wodee yaana; eti he wode xoomana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he spake also a parable unto them; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old; if otherwise, then both the new maketh a rent, and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etayyo leemisuwaa odiiddi, "Ooratta maayuwaappe peeridi, ceega maayo bolli wotti sikkiya asi baawa; hegaadan oottikko, ooratta maayuwaa peererettana; ooratta maayuwaappe peeridoogeekka ceega maayuwaassi giigenna.

English Sentences: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles; else the new wine will burst the bottles, and be spilled, and the bottles shall perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ho77o woine eessa ceega ogoron naaqqiya asi baawa; naaqqikko he woiniyaa eessai ogoruwaa daakkana; baukka gukkana; ogoroikka moorettana.

English Sentences: But new wine must be put into new bottles; and both are preserved.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ho77o woine eessa ooratta ogoron naaqqanau koshshees; eti issoi issuwaa naagoosona.

English Sentences: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new: for he saith, The old is better.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gam77ida woine eessa lo77o yaagiyo gishshau, a uyirggidi, oorattaa uyanau koyiyai ooninne baawa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first, that he went through the corn fields; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn, and did eat, rubbing them in their hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi issi Sambbata gallassi tiya bangga giddoora aadhdhishin, i erissiyo ashkkarati tiya banggaa duuttidi, bantta kushiyan shigichchidi moosona.

English Sentences: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them, Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days?
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi Parisaaweti, "Sambbatan oottanau woga gidennabaa aissi ootteetii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering them said, Have ye not read so much as this, what David did, when himself was an hungred, and they which were with him;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etassi zaaridi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Daawitinne aara de7iyaageeti namisettido wode, Daawiti oottidobaa nabbabibeekketii?

English Sentences: How he went into the house of God, and did take and eat the shewbread, and gave also to them that were with him; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone?
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Xoossaa keettaa gelidi, qeesetuppe attin, ooninne maanau higge gidennaagaa Xoossaassi yarshshido oittaa miidi, banaara de7iyaageetussikka immiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yesuusi, "Taani Asa Na7ai, Sambbataa Godaa" yaagidi etassi odiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass also on another sabbath, that he entered into the synagogue and taught: and there was a man whose right hand was withered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hara Sambbatan Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi tamaarissiis. Hegan ushachcha kushee gunddido issi bitanee de7ees.

English Sentences: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him, whether he would heal on the sabbath day; that they might find an accusation against him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti Yesuusa mootiyoobaa demmanau, i Sambbatan asa pattikko be7ana yaagidi naagi uttidosona.

English Sentences: But he knew their thoughts, and said to the man which had the withered hand, Rise up, and stand forth in the midst. And he arose and stood forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i eta qofaa eridi, kushee gunddido bitaniyaa, "Denddada, hagan gidduwan eqqa" yaagin, bitanee denddidi eqqiis.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus unto them, I will ask you one thing; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good, or to do evil? to save life, or to destroy it?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi eta, "Higgee Sambbatan lo77obaa oottanaagaa azaziiyye? Iitabaa oottanaagaa azazii? Asa shemppo ashshanaagaa azaziiyye woranaagaa azazii? yaagada inttena oichchais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And looking round about upon them all, he said unto the man, Stretch forth thy hand. And he did so: and his hand was restored whole as the other.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta ubbaa yuushshi aatti xeellidi bitaniyaa, "Ne kushiyaa piddi ootta" yaagiis. I piddi oottin, a kushee paxiis.

English Sentences: And they were filled with madness; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti daro hanqqettidosona. Hanqqettidi, "Nuuni Yesuusa ai oottanee?" yaagidi, bantta giddon haasayidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in those days, that he went out into a mountain to pray, and continued all night in prayer to God.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodiyan Yesuusi Xoossaa woossanau deree de7iyoosaa biis. Biidi qamma ubban Xoossaa woossiiddi aqiis.

English Sentences: And when it was day, he called unto him his disciples: and of them he chose twelve, whom also he named apostles;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi bana kaalliyaageeta wonttin xeesiis; etappe tammanne naa77aa dooridi, "Kiitettidaageeta" yaagidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: Simon, (whom he also named Peter,) and Andrew his brother, James and John, Philip and Bartholomew,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeeti PHeexiroosa yaagidi sunttido Simoona, a ishaa Inddiraasa, Yaaqooba, Yohaannisa, Piliphphoosa, Barttalamoosa,

English Sentences: Matthew and Thomas, James the son of Alphaeus, and Simon called Zelotes,
Wolaitta Sentences: Maatiyoosa, Toomaasa, Ilppiyoosa na7aa Yaaqooba, ba biittaassi mishettiya Simoona,

English Sentences: And Judas the brother of James, and Judas Iscariot, which also was the traitor.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqooba na7aa Yihudaanne Yesuusa aattidi immida Yihudaa Asqqoroota.

English Sentences: And he came down with them, and stood in the plain, and the company of his disciples, and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem, and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon, which came to hear him, and to be healed of their diseases;
Wolaitta Sentences: Etaara deriyaappe duge wodhdhidi, kaalliyaageetuppe daruwaara issippe dembba biittan eqqiis.

English Sentences: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits: and they were healed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi i giyoobaa siyidi, bantta harggiyaappe paxanau Yihudaa ubbaappe, Yerusalaameppe, abbaa matan de7iya Xiiroosappenne Sidoonappe yiida daro asai he sohuwan de7ees. Tuna ayyaanan waayettiyaageeti bantta harggiyaappe paxidosona.

English Sentences: And the whole multitude sought to touch him: for there went virtue out of him, and healed them all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wolqqai appe kiyidi, eta ubbaa pattiyo gishshau, asai ubbai a bochchanau keehi koyees.

English Sentences: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples, and said, Blessed be ye poor: for yours is the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratukko xeellidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Xoossaa kawotettai inttebaa gidiyo gishshau, hiyyeesati intte anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Blessed are ye that hunger now: for ye shall be filled. Blessed are ye that weep now: for ye shall laugh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte digin kallana gishshau, ha77i namisettiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta. Intte digin miiccana gishshau, ha77i yeekkiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Blessed are ye, when men shall hate you, and when they shall separate you from their company, and shall reproach you, and cast out your name as evil, for the Son of man's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte tana Asa Na7aa kaalliyo gishshau, asi inttena ixxiyo wode, asappe shaakkiyo wode, boriyo wode, inttena iita sunttan xeegiyo wodekka intte anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Rejoice ye in that day, and leap for joy: for, behold, your reward is great in heaven: for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intteyyo saluwan gita woitoi de7iyo gishshau, he wode ufaissan guppite; aissi giikko, eta aawati hananabaa yootiyaageeta hegaadan oottidosona.

English Sentences: But woe unto you that are rich! for ye have received your consolation.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin duretoo, intte ufaittidi de7iyo gishshau, intteyyo aayye7ana.

English Sentences: Woe unto you that are full! for ye shall hunger. Woe unto you that laugh now! for ye shall mourn and weep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte digin namisettana gishshau, ha77i kallidaageetoo, intteyyo aayye7ana. Intte qarettana gishshaunne yeekkana gishshau, ha77i miicciyaageetoo, intteyyo aayye7ana.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, when all men shall speak well of you! for so did their fathers to the false prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa ubbai inttebaa loittidi haasayiyo wode aayye7ana; aissi giikko, eta aawati hananabaa yootiya worddanchchatussi hegaadan oottoosona.

English Sentences: But I say unto you which hear, Love your enemies, do good to them which hate you,
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin taani yootiyoogaa siyiyaageetoo, taani intteyyo odais; intte morkketa siiqite; inttena ixxiyaageetussi lo77obaa oottite;

English Sentences: Bless them that curse you, and pray for them which despitefully use you.
Wolaitta Sentences: inttena qanggiyaageeta anjjite; inttena naaqqiyaageetussi Xoossaa woossite.

English Sentences: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other; and him that taketh away thy cloak forbid not to take thy coat also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne ne qinxxalliyaa baqqikko, hinkko qinxxalliyaakka bessa; ooninne ne kootiyaa ekkikko, qoliyaakka diggoppa.

English Sentences: Give to every man that asketh of thee; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nena woossiya ubbau imma; ne miishshaa ekkiya uraappe guyye zaara yaagada oichchoppa.

English Sentences: And as ye would that men should do to you, do ye also to them likewise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi intteyyo oottanau intte dosiyoogaadan, haraukka hegaadan oottite.

English Sentences: For if ye love them which love you, what thank have ye? for sinners also love those that love them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte inttena siiqiyaageetu xalaalaa siiqikko, intteyyo ai galati de7ii? Aissi giikko, nagaranchchatikka banttana siiqiyaageeta siiqoosona.

English Sentences: And if ye do good to them which do good to you, what thank have ye? for sinners also do even the same.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte intteyyo lo77obaa oottiyaageetussi lo77obaa oottikko, inttessi ai galati de7ii? Aissi giikko, nagaranchchatikka qassi hegaadan oottoosona.

English Sentences: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive, what thank have ye? for sinners also lend to sinners, to receive as much again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte guyye ekkanau qoppidi tal77ikko, inttessi ai galati de7ii? Nagaranchchatikka guyye ekkanau nagaranchchatussi tal77oosona;

English Sentences: But love ye your enemies, and do good, and lend, hoping for nothing again; and your reward shall be great, and ye shall be the children of the Highest: for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Xoossai bana galatennaageetussikka iitatussikka keha gidido gishshau, intte morkketa siiqite; etayyo lo77obaa oottite; qassi ainne guyye ekkanau qoppennan tal77ite; intte ekkana woitoi darana. Qassi intte Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa naata gidana.

English Sentences: Be ye therefore merciful, as your Father also is merciful.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Aawai Xoossai maariyoogaadan maarite.

English Sentences: Judge not, and ye shall not be judged: condemn not, and ye shall not be condemned: forgive, and ye shall be forgiven:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Haratu bolli pirddoppite; Xoossai intte bolli pirddenna. Harata iita gooppite; Xoossai inttena iita geenna. Atto giite; Xoossai intteyyo atto gaana.

English Sentences: Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Immite; Xoossai intteyyo immana. Baqqi naaqqidi siilli kunttin, palahidi wora laalettiyaagaa Xoossai intte kiyuwan idinttidi immana. Aissi giikko, intte harau immanau likkidi makkiyooban Xoossai intteyyo likkidi immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he spake a parable unto them, Can the blind lead the blind? shall they not both fall into the ditch?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etassi leemisuwaa odiiddi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Qooqee qooqe kaalettana danddayii? Kaalettikko, naa77ai ollan kunddokkonaa?

English Sentences: The disciple is not above his master: but every one that is perfect shall be as his master.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tamaariyaagee bana tamaarissiyaagaappe aadhdhenna; shin tamaaridi wurssida ubbai tamaarissiyaagaa mala gidees.

English Sentences: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother's eye, but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne aifiyan de7iya tuussaa be7akka; shin ne ishaa aifiyan de7iya suullaa aissi xeellai?

English Sentences: Either how canst thou say to thy brother, Brother, let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye, when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye?
