Thou hypocrite, cast out first the beam out of thine own eye, and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother's eye.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne aifiyan de7iya tuussaa be7ennan waanada ne ishaa, Ta ishau, taani ne aifiyan de7iya suullaa kessoo gaanau danddayai? Laa ha lo77o milatiya iitau, kasetada ne aifiyaappe tuussaa kessargga. Hegaappe guyyiyan, ne ishaa aifiyan de7iya suullaa kessanau geeshshada xeellana danddayaasa.

English Sentences: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lo77o mitti iita aife aifenna; hegaadankka, iita mitti lo77o aife aifenna.

English Sentences: For every tree is known by his own fruit. For of thorns men do not gather figs, nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, mitta ubbai ba aifiyo aifiyan erettees; agunttappe balase giyo mitta aife, gom77oreppe woine aife maxi erettenna.

English Sentences: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil: for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lo77o asi ba wozana giddon de7iya lo77o minjjaappe lo77obaa kessees; qassi iita asi ba iita minjjaappe iitabaa kessees; aissi giikko, asa dooni a wozanan kumidabaappe haasayees.

English Sentences: And why call ye me, Lord, Lord, and do not the things which I say?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani giyoogaa oottiyoogaa aggi bayidi, aissi tana, Godau, Godau geetii?

English Sentences: Whosoever cometh to me, and heareth my sayings, and doeth them, I will shew you to whom he is like:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taakko yiya ubbai qassi ta qaalaa siyidi azazettiyaagee ai mala asakko taani inttena bessana.

English Sentences: He is like a man which built an house, and digged deep, and laid the foundation on a rock: and when the flood arose, the stream beat vehemently upon that house, and could not shake it: for it was founded upon a rock.
Wolaitta Sentences: I gita ollaa bookkidi, aaho shuchchaa hiixxidi, gimbbidi, keettaa keexxida asa mala. Di7oi di77ido wode, he keettaa sugiis; shin minttidi keexxido gishshau, qaattanau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: But he that heareth, and doeth not, is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth; against which the stream did beat vehemently, and immediately it fell; and the ruin of that house was great.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ta qaalaa siyidi oottenna urai, aaho shuchcha hiixxennaaninne gimbbennan biittan keetta keexxida asa mala. Di7oi sugin, keettai sohuwaara kunddi aggiis; he keettai wolqqaama kunddetta kunddiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people, he entered into Capernaum.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ubbabaa asau wurssi odirggidoogaappe guyye baggan, Qifirinaahooma geliis.

English Sentences: And a certain centurion's servant, who was dear unto him, was sick, and ready to die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi mato halaqai de7iyaagaassi i dosiyo ashkkarai harggidi, haiqqana matiis.

English Sentences: And when he heard of Jesus, he sent unto him the elders of the Jews, beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: He mato halaqai Yesuusabaa siyido wode, Yesuusi yiidi, ba ashkkaraa pattanau woossana mala, Yihudaa cimata Yesuusakko kiittiis.

English Sentences: And when they came to Jesus, they besought him instantly, saying, That he was worthy for whom he should do this:
Wolaitta Sentences: Etinne Yesuusakko yiidi, "Neeni hegaa ayyo oottanau bessees.

English Sentences: For he loveth our nation, and he hath built us a synagogue.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i nu asaa siiqidi, Aihuda woosa keettaa ba miishshan keexxiis" yaagidi daro woossidosona. Yesuusinne etaara biis.

English Sentences: Then Jesus went with them. And when he was now not far from the house, the centurion sent friends to him, saying unto him, Lord, trouble not thyself: for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof:
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi mato halaqaa keettaa gakkanau matido wode, mato halaqai ba laggeta akko kiittidi, "Ta Godau, daafuroppa; aissi giikko, nena ta soo gelissanau tau bessenna.

English Sentences: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee: but say in a word, and my servant shall be healed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani neekko shiiqanau laafa gidiyoogaa erais; shin neeni doona xalaalaa haasaya; ta ashkkarai paxana.

English Sentences: For I also am a man set under authority, having under me soldiers, and I say unto one, Go, and he goeth; and to another, Come, and he cometh; and to my servant, Do this, and he doeth it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani taappe bollaara de7iyaageetuyyo haarettiya asa; taappe garssaara wotaaddarati de7oosona. Taani issuwaa, Ba giikko bees; qassi hinkkuwaa, Haa ya giikko yees; ta ashkkaraa, Hagaa ootta giikko oottees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When Jesus heard these things, he marvelled at him, and turned him about, and said unto the people that followed him, I say unto you, I have not found so great faith, no, not in Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaa siyido wode, aban garamettidi, guyye simmidi, bana kaalliya daro asaa, "Inttena gais; taani hagaa mala ammanuwaa harai atto, Israa7eela biittankka be7abeikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they that were sent, returning to the house, found the servant whole that had been sick.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitettida asati mato halaqaa soo guyye simmidi, a ashkkarai paxidaagaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass the day after, that he went into a city called Nain; and many of his disciples went with him, and much people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guyyeppe Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuuranne daro asaara Naina giyo issi katamaa biis.

English Sentences: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city, behold, there was a dead man carried out, the only son of his mother, and she was a widow: and much people of the city was with her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi katamaa dooni shiiqido wode, asai haiqqida asa ahaa tookkidi efees. Haiqqidaageenne ba aayeessi issi na7aa; a ba azinai haiqqoosappe am77e gidada de7ausu. Katamaa asaappe daroi o kaalliis.

English Sentences: And when the Lord saw her, he had compassion on her, and said unto her, Weep not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai o be7idi, iyyo qarettidi, "Yeekkoppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he came and touched the bier: and they that bare him stood still. And he said, Young man, I say unto thee, Arise.
Wolaitta Sentences: I shiiqidi, ahaa saaxiniyaa bochchin, tookkida asai eqqiis. Yesuusi, "Na7au, dendda gais" yaagin,

English Sentences: And he that was dead sat up, and began to speak. And he delivered him to his mother.
Wolaitta Sentences: haiqqidaagee xoqqu giidi uttiis. Qassi haasayaa doommin, Yesuusi na7aa a aayeessi immiis.

English Sentences: And there came a fear on all: and they glorified God, saying, That a great prophet is risen up among us; and, That God hath visited his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa ubbai daro yayyidi, "Hananabaa yootiya goobai nu giddon beettiis; qassi Xoossai ba asaa maaddanau yiis" yaagiiddi Xoossaa galatidosona.

English Sentences: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea, and throughout all the region round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee i oottidobai Yihudaa biittaa ubbaaninne hegaa heeran de7iya biitta ubban haasayettiis.

English Sentences: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa ubbaa Yohaannisassi yootidosona.

English Sentences: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus, saying, Art thou he that should come? or look we for another?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77aa baakko xeesidi, "Yaanaagee neneeyye? Woikko nuuni haraa naaganee?" yaagidi, eti oichchana mala, Yesuusakko kiittiis.

English Sentences: When the men were come unto him, they said, John Baptist hath sent us unto thee, saying, Art thou he that should come? or look we for another?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiittin eti akko yiidi, "Yaanaagee neneeyye? Woikko nuuni haraa naaganee? yaagidi oichchana mala, Xammaqiya Yohaannisi nuna neekko kiittiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues, and of evil spirits; and unto many that were blind he gave sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Yesuusi daro harggissidi, paxa kaa7iya sahuwaappenne iita ayyaanaappe daro asaa pattiis. Qassi daro qooqe asaa xeelissiis.

English Sentences: Then Jesus answering said unto them, Go your way, and tell John what things ye have seen and heard; how that the blind see, the lame walk, the lepers are cleansed, the deaf hear, the dead are raised, to the poor the gospel is preached.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Biidi intte be7idoogaanne siyidoogaa Yohaannisassi yootite; qooqeti xeelloosona; wobbeti hemettoosona; inchchirichchai oiqqidoogeeti paxoosona; tulleti siyoosona; haiqqidaageeti denddoosona; hiyyeesati wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa siyoosona.

English Sentences: And blessed is he, whosoever shall not be offended in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana sirenna urai anjjettidaagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the messengers of John were departed, he began to speak unto the people concerning John, What went ye out into the wilderness for to see? A reed shaken with the wind?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi kiittidoogeeti biichchidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Yohaannisabaa shiiqida asaassi hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis; "Ai be7anau bazzo kiyidetii? Carkkoi qaattiyo shombboquwaa be7anau kiyidetiiyye?

English Sentences: But what went ye out for to see? A man clothed in soft raiment? Behold, they which are gorgeously apparelled, and live delicately, are in kings' courts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin ai be7anau kiyidetii? Lo77iya maayuwaa maayida bitaniyaa be7anau kiyidetiiyye? Lo77iya maayuwaa maayidaageetinne duretidi ufaissan de7iyaageeti kawo keettan de7oosona.

English Sentences: But what went ye out for to see? A prophet? Yea, I say unto you, and much more than a prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin ai be7anau kiyidetii? Hananabaa yootiyaagaa be7anau kiyidetii? Ee; taani intteyyo odais; hananabaa yootiyaagaappekka aadhdhiyaagaa be7ideta.

English Sentences: This is he, of whom it is written, Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, which shall prepare thy way before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa maxaafan, Godai, "Be7a, ta kiittiyoogaa taani neeppe sinttau yeddana. I neeyyo ogiyaa kessana" yaagees geetettidi Yohaannisabai xaafettiis.

English Sentences: For I say unto you, Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist: but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo odais; aayee uluwaappe yelettida asa ubban Xammaqiya Yohaannisappe aadhdhiya ooninne de7ibeenna; shin Xoossaa kawotettan ubbaappe laafiyaageekka appe aadhdhana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all the people that heard him, and the publicans, justified God, being baptized with the baptism of John.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyida asai ubbai harai atto qaraxaa shiishshiyaageeti attennan, Yohaannisan xammaqettidi, Xoossai xillo gidiyoogaa ammanidosona.

English Sentences: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves, being not baptized of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti Yohaannisan xammaqettibeenna gishshau, Xoossai etassi qoppidobaa ixxidosona.

English Sentences: And the Lord said, Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation? and to what are they like?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Yaatin taani ha wodiyaa asaa aibiira leemisoo? Eti ai milatiyoonaa?

English Sentences: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace, and calling one to another, and saying, We have piped unto you, and ye have not danced; we have mourned to you, and ye have not wept.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti qocan uttiya naata milatoosona; bantta giddon issoi issuwaa xeesidi, Nuuni intteyyo cachcha zayiyaa punnida; shin duribeekketa. Yeeho yettaakka kessida; shin yeekkibeekketa yaagoosona.

English Sentences: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine; and ye say, He hath a devil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xammaqiya Yohaannisi Xoomiiddinne woine eessa uyennan yin intte, A bolli xalahee de7ees yaagideta.

English Sentences: The Son of man is come eating and drinking; and ye say, Behold a gluttonous man, and a winebibber, a friend of publicans and sinners!
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Asa Na7ai, maiddanne uyaidda yin, intte tana Asa Na7aa, Ha yoraanne woine eessaa uyiyaagaa be7ite! Giiraa ekkiyaageetuuranne nagaranchchatuura siiqettees yaageeta.

English Sentences: But wisdom is justified of all her children.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossaa aadhdhida eratettai ba oosuwan tuma gididi beettees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him. And he went into the Pharisee's house, and sat down to meat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Parisaawetuppe issoi banaara laaxaa maanau Yesuusa woossin, Yesuusi a soo yiidi, laaxaa maanau uttiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, a woman in the city, which was a sinner, when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee's house, brought an alabaster box of ointment,
Wolaitta Sentences: He kataman issi nagaranchcha mishiriyaa de7iyaara Yesuusi a son laaxau uttidoogaa erada, albbasxxiroosa giyo shuchchaappe oosettida bilqqaadiyaa kumida shittuwaa ehaasu.

English Sentences: And stood at his feet behind him weeping, and began to wash his feet with tears, and did wipe them with the hairs of her head, and kissed his feet, and anointed them with the ointment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guyyeera a tohuwaa matan eqqada yeekkishin, i afuttai a tohuwan xokkidi, laagottidoogaa ba huuphiyaa binnaanan quccausu. Tohuwaa quccaiddanne yeraidda shittuwan tiyausu.

English Sentences: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it, he spake within himself, saying, This man, if he were a prophet, would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him: for she is a sinner.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa ba soo xeesida Parisaawee hegaa be7idi, ba wozana giddon qoppiiddi, "A nagaranchcha gidiyo gishshau, hagee tumu hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidiyaakko, ha bana bochchiya mishiriyaa oonakko erana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering said unto him, Simon, I have somewhat to say unto thee. And he saith, Master, say on.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Simoonaa, neessi taani odiyoobai de7ees" yaagiis. Yaagin, Simooni, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, yoota" yaagiis.

English Sentences: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors: the one owed five hundred pence, and the other fifty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hagaadan yaagiis; "Naa77u asati issi bitaniyaappe miishsha tal77idosona. Issoi naa77u xeetanne ishatamu biraa tal77in, naa77anttoi laatamanne ichchashu biraa tal77iis.

English Sentences: And when they had nothing to pay, he frankly forgave them both. Tell me therefore, which of them will love him most?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa qanxxanau etassi miishshi xayin, acuwaawai naa77aakka maariis. Yaatin etappe augee a aattidi siiqanai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Simon answered and said, I suppose that he, to whom he forgave most. And he said unto him, Thou hast rightly judged.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simooni zaaridi, "Dariya biraa aggido bitaniyaa gidennan aggenna" yaagiis. Yaagin Yesuusi Simoona, "Tumu pirddadasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he turned to the woman, and said unto Simon, Seest thou this woman? I entered into thine house, thou gavest me no water for my feet: but she hath washed my feet with tears, and wiped them with the hairs of her head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi mishireekko xeellidi, Simoona hagaadan yaagiis; "Hanno mishiriyo be7ai? Taani ne soo yin, harai atto haattaa ta tohuwaassi immabaakka; shin hanna ba afuttan ta tohuwaa laagottada, ba huuphiyaa binnaanan quccaasu.

English Sentences: Thou gavest me no kiss: but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana yerabaakka; shin a taani soo geloosappe ha77i gakkanaashin, ta tohuwaa yerausu.

English Sentences: My head with oil thou didst not anoint: but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta huuphiyaa zaitiyan tiyabaakka; shin a ta tohuwaa shittuwan tiyaasu.

English Sentences: Wherefore I say unto thee, Her sins, which are many, are forgiven; for she loved much: but to whom little is forgiven, the same loveth little.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani inttessi odais; a daro siiqido gishshau, i nagarai daroi atto geetettiis; shin guutta nagaraa atto giido urai guuttaa siiqees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto her, Thy sins are forgiven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi mishiriyo, "Ne nagarai attiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves, Who is this that forgiveth sins also?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin, aara laaxaa maanau uttidaageeti bantta wozana giddon qoppiiddi, "Harai atto nagaraakka atto gaanau danddayiyaagee hagee oonee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said to the woman, Thy faith hath saved thee; go in peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi mishiriyo, "Nena ne ammanoi ashshiis; saruwan ba" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass afterward, that he went throughout every city and village, preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God: and the twelve were with him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi Xoossaa kawotettaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi, dumma dumma gita katamaanne guutta katamaa bees. Biyo wode, tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratinne

English Sentences: And certain women, which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities, Mary called Magdalene, out of whom went seven devils,
Wolaitta Sentences: iita ayyaanaappenne wolqqaama harggiyaappe paxida issi issi maccaasatinne aara issippe de7oosona. Hegeetinne laappun xalaheti kiyido Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaamo,

English Sentences: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod's steward, and Susanna, and many others, which ministered unto him of their substance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisa keettan azaziya Kuza machchiyo Yohaano, Sosinonne Yesuusau banttassi de7iyaagaappe immida daro asata.

English Sentences: And when much people were gathered together, and were come to him out of every city, he spake by a parable:
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai katamaappe kataman Yesuusakko shiiqees. Daro asai shiiqidaagau Yesuusi leemisuwaa hagaadan yaagidi odiis;

English Sentences: A sower went out to sow his seed: and as he sowed, some fell by the way side; and it was trodden down, and the fowls of the air devoured it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi bitanee ba zerettaa zeranau kiyiis. Zerishin, issoi issoi ogiyaa doonan wodhdhidi yerettiis. Yaatin, kafoi hegaa miis.

English Sentences: And some fell upon a rock; and as soon as it was sprung up, it withered away, because it lacked moisture.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harai shuchchaa bolli wodhdhiis. Mokkidi, dubbai bainna gishshau meliis.

English Sentences: And some fell among thorns; and the thorns sprang up with it, and choked it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi zerettai aguntta giddon wodhdhiis; wodhdhidi mokkidaagaa agunttai diccidi cuulliis.

English Sentences: And other fell on good ground, and sprang up, and bare fruit an hundredfold. And when he had said these things, he cried, He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi zerettai aradda biittan wodhdhidi mokkiis; diccidi xeetu kushiyaa aifiis" yaagiis. Yesuusi hegaa haasayiiddi, "Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai siyo!" yaagidi wolqqappe haasayiis.

English Sentences: And his disciples asked him, saying, What might this parable be?
Wolaitta Sentences: I erissiyo ashkkarati, "Yaatin, ha leemisuwaa birshshettai aibee?" yaagidi Yesuusa oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God: but to others in parables; that seeing they might not see, and hearing they might not understand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin, i hagaadan yaagiis; "Inttessi Xoossaa kawotettaa xuuraa erai imettiis, shin harati xeellidi be7enna mala, siyidikka akeekenna mala, taani leemisuwan haasayais.

English Sentences: Now the parable is this: The seed is the word of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Leemisoi hagaa. Zerettai Xoossaa qaalaa. Ogiyaa doonan de7iya zerettai qaalaa siyidaageetu leemisuwaa bessees;

English Sentences: Those by the way side are they that hear; then cometh the devil, and taketh away the word out of their hearts, lest they should believe and be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin hegaappe guyyiyan, eti ammanidi attenna mala, xalahe halaqai yiidi, eta wozanaappe qaalaa efirggees.

English Sentences: They on the rock are they, which, when they hear, receive the word with joy; and these have no root, which for a while believe, and in time of temptation fall away.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHuchchaa bollan de7iyaageeti siyiiddi, a qaalaa ufaissan ekkiyaageeta milatoosona; etassi xaphoi baawa. Eti ha77issau ammaniyoogaappe attin, paacee yiyo wode xubettiyaageeta.

English Sentences: And that which fell among thorns are they, which, when they have heard, go forth, and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life, and bring no fruit to perfection.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi aguntta giddon wodhdhidaageeti siyiyaageeta milatoosona. Siyidi banttau de7iiddi, de7uwaa wodiyaa qofan duretettaaninne lo77o de7uwan cuulettiyo gishshau, eta aifee bootennan atti aggees.

English Sentences: But that on the good ground are they, which in an honest and good heart, having heard the word, keep it, and bring forth fruit with patience.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin aradda biittan wodhdhidaageeti hegeeti lo77o wozanaappenne tumu wozanaappe qaalaa siyidi naagidaageeta; eti danddayaara naagidi aifoosona.

English Sentences: No man, when he hath lighted a candle, covereth it with a vessel, or putteth it under a bed; but setteth it on a candlestick, that they which enter in may see the light.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xomppe oittidi, keren qum77iyai woikko arssa giddon wottiya asi baawa; shin asai geliiddi, poo7uwaa be7ana mala, xomppiyaa qoncciyan wottees.

English Sentences: For nothing is secret, that shall not be made manifest; neither any thing hid, that shall not be known and come abroad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, qosidobai ubbai qoncciyaa kiyana; qassi genttidobai ubbaikka beettennan attenna.

English Sentences: Take heed therefore how ye hear: for whosoever hath, to him shall be given; and whosoever hath not, from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi, intte siyiyo yohuwaa ezggidi siyite; aissi giikko, issibai de7iyo urau gujji immana. Bainnaagaappe harai atto, he au de7iyaabaa milatiyaagaakka ekkirggana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then came to him his mother and his brethren, and could not come at him for the press.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa aayyiyaanne ishantti akko yiidosona; shin daro asaa giddoora aadhdhiyo sohoi bainna gishshau, aara gaittanau danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: And it was told him by certain which said, Thy mother and thy brethren stand without, desiring to see thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Yesuusa, "Ne aayyiyaanne ne ishantti nenaara gaittana koyidi, karen eqqidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he answered and said unto them, My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God, and do it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi, "Ta aayyiyaanne ta ishantti Xoossaa qaalaa siyiyaageetanne oottiyaageeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now it came to pass on a certain day, that he went into a ship with his disciples: and he said unto them, Let us go over unto the other side of the lake. And they launched forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi, Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe wolwoluwan gelidi, "Abbaa hefintti pinnoos" yaagiis; yaagin biidosona.

English Sentences: But as they sailed he fell asleep: and there came down a storm of wind on the lake; and they were filled with water, and were in jeopardy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biishin Yesuusi xiskkiis. Wolqqaama gotee abbaa bolli yiis. Wolwoluwan haattai kumi kumi yees. Yiidi haattai eta mittana hanin,

English Sentences: And they came to him, and awoke him, saying, Master, master, we perish. Then he arose, and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water: and they ceased, and there was a calm.
Wolaitta Sentences: erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko biidi, "Godau, Godau, nuuni xayoos" yaagidi, xiskkuwaappe a denttidosona. Yesuusi denddidi, gotiyaanne beetaa aggite gin, goteenne beetai woppu giidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Where is your faith? And they being afraid wondered, saying one to another, What manner of man is this! for he commandeth even the winds and water, and they obey him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Yesuusi, "Intte ammanoi anee?" yaagiis. Eti yayyidinne garamettidi bantta giddon, "Hagee laa harai atto, gotiyaanne haattaa azaziyaagee oonee? Etikka ayyo azazettoosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes, which is over against Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Galiila ginan sinttaara de7iya Gerggesenoona giyo biittaa wolwoluwan biidosona.

English Sentences: And when he went forth to land, there met him out of the city a certain man, which had devils long time, and ware no clothes, neither abode in any house, but in the tombs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi abbaappe gaxaa kiyiyoorin, xalaheti de7iyo bitanee katamaappe kiyidi, aara gaittiis; asa moogiyo gonggoluwan i daro laittaa de7iyoogaappe attin, son de7enna.

English Sentences: When he saw Jesus, he cried out, and fell down before him, and with a loud voice said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of God most high? I beseech thee, torment me not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa be7idi, a sinttan kunddidi, qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Ubbaappe bolla Xoossaa Na7au Yesuusaa, tananne nenanne aibee gattiyai? Hayyanaa tana qaxxayopparkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: (For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man. For oftentimes it had caught him: and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters; and he brake the bands, and was driven of the devil into the wilderness.)
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaa aissi giidee giikko, Yesuusi tuna ayyaanai bitaniyaappe kiyidi baana mala azazidoogaassa. Daroto tuna ayyaanai bitaniyaa oiqqi uttido gishshau, sanssalataaninne huqqunna biratan qashettidi naagettees; shin sanssalataa duuttees. Xalahee a bazzo yedettees.

English Sentences: And Jesus asked him, saying, What is thy name? And he said, Legion: because many devils were entered into him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi a, "Ne sunttai oonee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Daro xalaheti an de7iyo gishshau, "Ta sunttai Leegiyoona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xalaheti Yesuusa, "Nuna ciimma ollau yeddopparkkii" yaagidi woossidosona.

English Sentences: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain: and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them. And he suffered them.
Wolaitta Sentences: He deriyaa bollan daro gudunttaa wudee hemettees; xalaheti gudunttatu giddo gelana mala Yesuusa woossin, i, "Biite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then went the devils out of the man, and entered into the swine: and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake, and were choked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin xalaheti bitaniyaappe kiyidi, gudunttatun gelin, wudee kakaara jaamiiddi abban gelidi, meetetti bayiis.

English Sentences: When they that fed them saw what was done, they fled, and went and told it in the city and in the country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gudunttaa wudiyaa heemmiyaageeti hanidabaa be7ido wode, baqati biidi, katamaaninne katamaappe gaxa biittan yootidosona.

English Sentences: Then they went out to see what was done; and came to Jesus, and found the man, out of whom the devils were departed, sitting at the feet of Jesus, clothed, and in his right mind: and they were afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yootin asai hanidabaa be7anau kiyidi, Yesuusakko biis. Xalahee kiyido bitanee ba wozanai simmin, maayuwaa maayidi, Yesuusa gediyaa matan uttidaagaa asai be7idi yayyiis.

English Sentences: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa be7ida asati xalaheti oiqqido bitanee waani paxidaakko, asaassi yootidosona.

English Sentences: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them; for they were taken with great fear: and he went up into the ship, and returned back again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gerggesenoona biittan de7iya asai ubbai daro yayyido gishshau, bantta matappe baana mala, Yesuusa woossidosona. Yesuusi wolwoluwan gelidi simmiis.

English Sentences: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him: but Jesus sent him away, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xalaheti kiyido bitanee Yesuusaara de7ana mala, Yesuusa woossiis; shin i, "Ne soo simmada, Xoossai neessi waanida gitabaa oottidaakko yoota" yaagidi a yeddiis.

English Sentences: Return to thine own house, and shew how great things God hath done unto thee. And he went his way, and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeddin, bitanee baassi Yesuusi waanida gitabaa oottidaakko, kataman de7iya asa ubbau yootiiddi biis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, when Jesus was returned, the people gladly received him: for they were all waiting for him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubba asai Yesuusa naagiiddi uttido gishshau, i simmido wode mokkidosona.

English Sentences: And, behold, there came a man named Jairus, and he was a ruler of the synagogue: and he fell down at Jesus' feet, and besought him that he would come into his house:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7iroosa giyoogee Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqai Yesuusakko yiis.

English Sentences: For he had one only daughter, about twelve years of age, and she lay a dying. But as he went the people thronged him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ayyo tammanne naa77u laitta na7iyaa de7iyaara harggada haiqqana haniyo gishshau, Yesuusa tohuwan kunddidi, ba soo gelana mala, a minttidi woossiis. Yesuusi yaa biishin, asai ubbasaara shiiqidi, a un77iis.

English Sentences: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years, which had spent all her living upon physicians, neither could be healed of any,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne naa77u laittaasappe doommidi, i bollaappe suuttai goggiyo issi maccaasiyaa de7ausu. Aakimetussi qanxxaidda ba miishsha ubbaa wurssaasu; shin ooninne o pattanau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: Came behind him, and touched the border of his garment: and immediately her issue of blood stanched.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guyyeera shiiqada Yesuusa afalaa macaraa bochchaasu; bochchin i bollaappe goggiya suuttai sohuwaarakka aggi bayiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said, Who touched me? When all denied, Peter and they that were with him said, Master, the multitude throng thee and press thee, and sayest thou, Who touched me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Tana bochchidai oonee?" yaagiis. Ubba asai, "Nuna gidokko" yaagin, PHeexiroosinne aara issippe de7iyaageeti, "Godau, daro asai nena sugiiddi un77ees; Tana bochchidai oonee? gai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus said, Somebody hath touched me: for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi, "Taappe wolqqai kiyido gishshau, tana issi urai bochchidoogaa taani erais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the woman saw that she was not hid, she came trembling, and falling down before him, she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him, and how she was healed immediately.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa qosettada attanau danddayennaagaa erada, kokkoraidda Yesuusa sinttan gufannaasu; a Yesuusa aissi bochchidaakkonne qassi waanada sohuwaara paxidaakko asa ubbaa sinttan Yesuusau yootaasu.

English Sentences: And he said unto her, Daughter, be of good comfort: thy faith hath made thee whole; go in peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: I, "Ta na7ee, nena ne ammanoi pattiis; saro ba" yaagiis.

English Sentences: While he yet spake, there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue's house, saying to him, Thy daughter is dead; trouble not the Master.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi biron hegaa giishin, issi asi Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqaa sooppe yiidi, "Ne na7iyaa haiqqaichchaasu; simmi tamaarissiyaagaa daafurssoppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But when Jesus heard it, he answered him, saying, Fear not: believe only, and she shall be made whole.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti giyoobaa Yesuusi siyidi, "Yayyoppa; ammano xalaalaa ammana; a paxana" yaagidi Yaa7iroosassi yootiis.

English Sentences: And when he came into the house, he suffered no man to go in, save Peter, and James, and John, and the father and the mother of the maiden.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi soo geliiddi, PHeexiroosappe, Yaaqoobappe, Yohaannisappe, na7ee aayeeppenne aawaappe harai ooninne banaara gelenna mala diggiis.

English Sentences: And all wept, and bewailed her: but he said, Weep not; she is not dead, but sleepeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbai na7eessi, "Aayyee aayyee!" yaagidi yeekkoosona. SHin Yesuusi, "Yeekkoppite; na7iyaa xiskkausuppe attin, haiqqabeikku" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they laughed him to scorn, knowing that she was dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: A haiqqidoogaa eridi, asai a bolli miicciis.

English Sentences: And he put them all out, and took her by the hand, and called, saying, Maid, arise.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi i kushiyaa oiqqidi, "Na7ee, dendda" yaagidi xeesiis.

English Sentences: And her spirit came again, and she arose straightway: and he commanded to give her meat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7ee shemppoi simmin, sohuwaara na7iyaa dendda aggaasu. Yesuusi, "Iyyo miyoobaa immite" yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And her parents were astonished: but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done.
Wolaitta Sentences: I aawainne aayyiyaa garamettidosona. SHin Yesuusi, "Hanidaagaa oossinne odoppite" yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: Then he called his twelve disciples together, and gave them power and authority over all devils, and to cure diseases.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata issippe baakko xeesidi, xalahiyaa ubbaa asaappe kessanaunne harggiyaageeta pattanau etassi wolqqaanne alaafetettaa immiis.

English Sentences: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God, and to heal the sick.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa kawotettaabaa yootanaunne harggiyaageeta pattanau eta kiittiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Take nothing for your journey, neither staves, nor scrip, neither bread, neither money; neither have two coats apiece.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Gatima woi qarcciita woi quma woi miishsha ainnekka ogiyaa biiddi oiqqoppite; naa77antto qoliyaakka oiqqoppite.

English Sentences: And whatsoever house ye enter into, there abide, and thence depart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttena asi awan mokkikkokka, katamaappe kiyana gakkanaashin, he keettan utti bayite.

English Sentences: And whosoever will not receive you, when ye go out of that city, shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Katamaa asai inttena mokkennan ixxikko, he katamaappe kiyite; kiyiiddi eti inttena mokkennan ixxidoogaassi markka gidana mala, intte tohuwaappe buhiyaa shocite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they departed, and went through the towns, preaching the gospel, and healing every where.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati biidi, qeeri katama ubban Xoossaa qaalaa yootiiddinne harggiya asaa ubbasan pattiiddi yuuyoosona.

English Sentences: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him: and he was perplexed, because that it was said of some, that John was risen from the dead;
Wolaitta Sentences: Galiila biittaa haariya Heeroodisi hanidabaa ubbaa siyiis. Issi issi asai, "Yohaannisi haiquwaappe denddiis" yaagees; hinkko asai, "Eelaasi kiyidi beettiis" yaagees;

English Sentences: And of some, that Elias had appeared; and of others, that one of the old prophets was risen again.
Wolaitta Sentences: harati, "Beni hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe issoi denddiis" yaagoosona. Hegaa gishshau, Heeroodisi ba wozana giddon metootiis.

English Sentences: And Herod said, John have I beheaded: but who is this, of whom I hear such things? And he desired to see him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Metootidi, "Taani Yohaannisa qooriyaa muucissarggaas; shin hagaadan asai haasayiyo bitanee oonee?" yaagidi, Yesuusa be7anau koyiis.

English Sentences: And the apostles, when they were returned, told him all that they had done. And he took them, and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti simmidi, bantta oottidobaa ubbaa Yesuusassi odidosona. Yesuusi eta xalaalaa ekkidi, Beetasaida giyo katamaa matan de7iya bazzuwaa biis.

English Sentences: And the people, when they knew it, followed him: and he received them, and spake unto them of the kingdom of God, and healed them that had need of healing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai a eridi kaallin, eta mokkidi, Xoossaa kawotettaabaa yootiis; harggiyaappe pattanau koshshiyoogeetakka pattiis.

English Sentences: And when the day began to wear away, then came the twelve, and said unto him, Send the multitude away, that they may go into the towns and country round about, and lodge, and get victuals: for we are here in a desert place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omariyo wode, tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko yiidi, "Asa ubbai dere giddonne qeeri katamatu giddo biidi, aqiyoosaanne shinqqe demmana mala, asaa yedda; aissi giikko, nuuni hagan asi bainnasan de7oos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he said unto them, Give ye them to eat. And they said, We have no more but five loaves and two fishes; except we should go and buy meat for all this people.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta, "Asau miyoobaa intte immite" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Nuuyyo ichchashu oittappenne naa77u moleppe hari baawa; nuuni ha daro asau qumaa shammanau baanaagaa koyai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: For they were about five thousand men. And he said to his disciples, Make them sit down by fifties in a company.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, he sohuwan ichchashu sha7u gidiya asai de7ees. Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata, "Ishatamu ishatamu asaa citan citan shaakki shaakki utissite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they did so, and made them all sit down.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati i giidoogaadan, ubba asaa utissidosona.

English Sentences: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes, and looking up to heaven, he blessed them, and brake, and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ichchashu oittaanne naa77u moliyaa oiqqidi, saluwaa pude xeellidi, Xoossaa galatiis; he oittaanne moliyaa menttidi, "Daro asaa sintti aattite" yaagidi, erissiyo ashkkaratussi immiis.

English Sentences: And they did eat, and were all filled: and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa ubbai miidi kalliis; kallin attida xarzzai tammanne naa77u samppaa kumidaagaa denttidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as he was alone praying, his disciples were with him: and he asked them, saying, Whom say the people that I am?
Wolaitta Sentences: Issitoo Yesuusi barkka woossiyo wode, i erissiyo ashkkarati a matan de7oosona; de7ishin, "Asai tana oona gii?" yaagidi eta oichchiis.

English Sentences: They answering said, John the Baptist; but some say, Elias; and others say, that one of the old prophets is risen again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaaridi, "Asai nena Xammaqiya Yohaannisa yaagees; hara asai Eelaasa yaagees; harai qassi beni hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe issoi denddiis yaagees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: He said unto them, But whom say ye that I am? Peter answering said, The Christ of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi eta, "Yaanin intte tana oona geetii?" yaagiis. PHeexiroosi zaaridi, "Neeni Xoossai tiyido Kiristtoosa" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: And he straitly charged them, and commanded them to tell no man that thing;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta, "Hagaa oossinne odoppite" yaagidi, minttidi azaziiddi,

English Sentences: Saying, The Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be slain, and be raised the third day.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani, Asa Na7ai, daro waayettanau bessees; tana cimati, qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti ixxanau bessees; eti tana woranaunne taani heezzantto gallassi haiquwaappe denddanau bessees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said to them all, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross daily, and follow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi asa ubbaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Ba shemppuwaa ashshana koyiya urai bashshana; shin ba shemppuwaa ta gishshau bashshiya urai ashshana; hegaa gishshau, tana kaallana koyiya urai de7ikko,

English Sentences: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it: but whosoever will lose his life for my sake, the same shall save it.
Wolaitta Sentences: bana yeggi bayo; yaatidi ubba gallassi ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi, tana kaallo.

English Sentences: For what is a man advantaged, if he gain the whole world, and lose himself, or be cast away?
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi urai ba huuphiyaa bashshidi, woi bau pacissidi, sa7an de7iya ubbabaa bau shiishshikko, a ai maaddanee?

English Sentences: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words, of him shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he shall come in his own glory, and in his Father's, and of the holy angels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi tanaaninne ta qaalan yeellatikko, taani Asa Na7ai, ta bonchchuwaara, ta Aawaa bonchchuwaaranne geeshsha kiitanchchatu bonchchuwaara yiyo wode, aani yeellatana.

English Sentences: But I tell you of a truth, there be some standing here, which shall not taste of death, till they see the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; amarida asati Xoossaa kawotettaa be7ennan haiqqennaageeti hagan de7oosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings, he took Peter and John and James, and went up into a mountain to pray.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hegaadan giidoogaappe guyyiyan, hosppun gallassa gidiyaagaa gam77idi, PHeexiroosa, Yohaannisanne Yaaqooba ekkidi, woossanau deriyaa huuphiyaa kiyiis.

English Sentences: And as he prayed, the fashion of his countenance was altered, and his raiment was white and glistering.
Wolaitta Sentences: I woossishin, a merai laamettiis. A maayoikka phoolidi booxxiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, there talked with him two men, which were Moses and Elias:
Wolaitta Sentences: Akeekennan, Muusanne Eelaasa giyo naa77u asati kiyi beettidi, aara haasayidosona.

English Sentences: Who appeared in glory, and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bonchchuwaara beettidi, Yesuusi Xoossaa qofaa polanau Yerusalaamen haiqqanaagaa aara haasayidosona.

English Sentences: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep: and when they were awake, they saw his glory, and the two men that stood with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosinne aara de7iyaageeti xiskkuwan kairidosona. SHin beegottidi, Yesuusa bonchchuwaanne aara issippe eqqida naa77u asata be7idosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as they departed from him, Peter said unto Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias: not knowing what he said.
Wolaitta Sentences: He naa77u asati Yesuusa matappe biishin, PHeexiroosi Yesuusassi woigiyaakko akeekidi erennan a, "Ta Godau, nuuni hagan de7iyoogee nuussi lo77o; nuuni heezzu zamppata issuwaa neessi, issuwaa Muusessi, issuwaa Eelaasassi zamppayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: While he thus spake, there came a cloud, and overshadowed them: and they feared as they entered into the cloud.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi hegaa etassi giishin, shaarai yiidi, eta genttiis. Genttishin erissiyo ashkkarati yayyidosona.

English Sentences: And there came a voice out of the cloud, saying, This is my beloved Son: hear him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaaraappe, "Hagee taani doorido ta Na7aa; i giyoogaa siyite" giya qaalai yiis.

English Sentences: And when the voice was past, Jesus was found alone. And they kept it close, and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi barkka attiis. Eti co77u giidi, oossinne he wode be7ido yohuwaappe ainne odibookkona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that on the next day, when they were come down from the hill, much people met him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi, eti deriyaappe duge wodhdhido wode, daro asai Yesuusaara gaittiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, a man of the company cried out, saying, Master, I beseech thee, look upon my son: for he is mine only child.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai qoppennan asaappe issoi ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, taassi issi na7aa xalaalai de7iyo gishshau, neeni a be7anau nena woossais;

English Sentences: And, lo, a spirit taketh him, and he suddenly crieth out; and it teareth him that he foameth again, and bruising him hardly departeth from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi iita ayyaanai au denddees; denddidi akeekennan a waasissees; a doonaara hoommoi goppattana gakkanaashin a kokkorssidi, ubba gallassi qohiyoogaappe attin, a elle yeddenna.

English Sentences: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out; and they could not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne erissiyo ashkkarati he iita ayyaanaa kessana mala, taani eta woossaas; shin danddayibookkona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering said, O faithless and perverse generation, how long shall I be with you, and suffer you? Bring thy son hither.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi eta, "Ammanenna ha wodiyaa geella asau! Taani inttenaara aude gakkanaashin de7anee? Qassi inttebaa aude gakkanaashin danddayanee? Ne na7aa haa ekka ya" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as he was yet a coming, the devil threw him down, and tare him. And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit, and healed the child, and delivered him again to his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7ai yiishin, xalahee a sa7an ooggidi kokkorssiis; shin Yesuusi tuna ayyaanaa agga giidi, na7aa pattidi, a aawaassi zaaridi immiis.

English Sentences: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God. But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did, he said unto his disciples,
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa ubbai Xoossaa gita wolqqan garamettiis. Eti ubbai Yesuusi oottido ubbaban garamettishin, i ba erissiyo ashkkaratussi yootiiddi,

English Sentences: Let these sayings sink down into your ears: for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tana Asa Na7aa asi asau aattidi immana; ha yohuwaa dogoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But they understood not this saying, and it was hid from them, that they perceived it not: and they feared to ask him of that saying.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i giyoogaa eti akeekibookkona; eti akeekenna mala, etappe yohoi geemmiis. He yohuwaa a oichchanau yayyoosona.

English Sentences: Then there arose a reasoning among them, which of them should be greatest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati, "Nu giddon aadhdhiyaagee oonee?" yaagidi palamettidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus, perceiving the thought of their heart, took a child, and set him by him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eti qoppiyoogaa eridi, guutta na7aa ehiidi, ba matan essidi,

English Sentences: And said unto them, Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me: and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me: for he that is least among you all, the same shall be great.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha guutta na7aa ta sunttan mokkiya ooninne tana mokkees; qassi tana mokkiyaagee tana kiittidaagaakka mokkees; aissi giikko, intte ubbaa giddon guuxxiyaagee ubbaappe gitatees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And John answered and said, Master, we saw one casting out devils in thy name; and we forbad him, because he followeth not with us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi zaaridi, "Godau, issi asi ne sunttan xalaheta kessiyaagaa nuuni be7idi, nu bagga gidenna gishshau, a diggida" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto him, Forbid him not: for he that is not against us is for us.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi a, "Intte giyoobaa phalqqenna urai intte bagga gidiyo gishshau, a diggoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when the time was come that he should be received up, he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi saluwaa biyo wodee matin, Yerusalaame baanau denddiis.

English Sentences: And sent messengers before his face: and they went, and entered into a village of the Samaritans, to make ready for him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ba kiittiyoogeeta baappe sinttau kiittiis; kiittin eti ayyo ubbabaa giigissanau, Samaariyaa biittan de7iya issi qeeri katamaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And they did not receive him, because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i Yerusalaame baanau denddido gishshau, asai a mokkibeenna.

English Sentences: And when his disciples James and John saw this, they said, Lord, wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven, and consume them, even as Elias did?
Wolaitta Sentences: I erissiyo ashkkarati Yaaqoobinne Yohaannisi hegaa be7idi, "Godau, nuuni Eelaasi oottidoogaadan, Tamai saluwaappe yiidi eta mo yaagana mala koyai?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he turned, and rebuked them, and said, Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin guyye simmidi eta, "Aggite, inttessi ai mala ayyaani de7iyaakko erekketa.

English Sentences: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men's lives, but to save them. And they went to another village.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, Asa Na7ai, asa shemppo ashshanau yiidoogaappe attin, bashshanau yabeikke" yaagiis. Eti harasan de7iya qeeri katamaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, as they went in the way, a certain man said unto him, Lord, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ogiyaara biishin, issi bitanee a, "Godau, neeni biyoosaa ubbaa taani nena kaallana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto him, Foxes have holes, and birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi a, "Worakanatussi ollai de7ees; kafotussikka keettai de7ees; shin taani, Asa Na7ai, zin77ada shemppa ekkiyoosikka tau baawa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto another, Follow me. But he said, Lord, suffer me first to go and bury my father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi haraa, "Tana kaalla" yaagiis. SHin, bitanee "Godau, taani kaseta baada ta aawaa moogoo?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Jesus said unto him, Let the dead bury their dead: but go thou and preach the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi a, "Haiqqidaageeti bantta haiqqidaageeta moogona; nena gidikko baada, Xoossaa kawotettaabaa yoota" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And another also said, Lord, I will follow thee; but let me first go bid them farewell, which are at home at my house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi hara bitanee, "Godau, taani nena kaallana; shin koiroora ta so asaa saro goo?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto him, No man, having put his hand to the plough, and looking back, is fit for the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi a, "Booraa goyiiddi, guyye xeelliyai ooninne Xoossaa kawotettaassi bessenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: After these things the LORD appointed other seventy also, and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place, whither he himself would come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Godai hara laappun tammu asata dooriis. Etappe naa77aa naa77aa bau baanau qoppi uttido katamaanne sohuwaa ubbaa baappe sinttau kiittiis.

English Sentences: Therefore said he unto them, The harvest truly is great, but the labourers are few: pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest, that he would send forth labourers into his harvest.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Kattai daro; shin cakkiyaageeti guutta; hegaa gishshau, kattaa Godai kattaa cakkiyaageeta yeddana mala, a woossite.

English Sentences: Go your ways: behold, I send you forth as lambs among wolves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i biite; taani inttena wanggireello giddon de7iya dorssa maraadan yeddais.

English Sentences: Carry neither purse, nor scrip, nor shoes: and salute no man by the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Korjjokka qarcciitakka caammakka oiqqoppite; ogiyan oonanne sarotoppite.

English Sentences: And into whatsoever house ye enter, first say, Peace be to this house.
Wolaitta Sentences: "O keettanne intte geliyo wode koiroora, Sarotettai ha keettaassi gido yaagite.

English Sentences: And if the son of peace be there, your peace shall rest upon it: if not, it shall turn to you again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sarotettaa koyiya asi hegan de7ikko, sarotettan i de7ana; shin koyennan ixxikko, sarotettai inttekko simmana.

English Sentences: And in the same house remain, eating and drinking such things as they give: for the labourer is worthy of his hire. Go not from house to house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oosanchchaassi damoozaa qanxxanau koshshiyo gishshau, eti immiyoobaa miiddinne uyiiddi he keettan utti bayite; ha sooppe ya soo booppite.

English Sentences: And into whatsoever city ye enter, and they receive you, eat such things as are set before you:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte ai katamanne geliyo wode, asi inttena mokkikko, intte sinttau aattidobaa miite.

English Sentences: And heal the sick that are therein, and say unto them, The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan de7iya hargganchchata pattidi eta, Xoossaa kawotettai inttekko matiis yaagite;

English Sentences: But into whatsoever city ye enter, and they receive you not, go your ways out into the streets of the same, and say,
Wolaitta Sentences: shin intte geliyo katama ubbai inttena mokkennan ixxikko, he katamaa ogiyaa kiyidi,

English Sentences: Even the very dust of your city, which cleaveth on us, we do wipe off against you: notwithstanding be ye sure of this, that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni inttena yeellayanau, harai atto intte katamaappe nu tohuwaa oiqqida buhiyaakka inttessi pittoos; shin Xoossaa kawotettai inttekko matidoogaa hegaa erite yaagite.

English Sentences: But I say unto you, that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom, than for that city.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Sadooma katamai ekkido pirddaappe aadhdhiya pirddai he katamaa gakkanaagaa taani inttessi odais.

English Sentences: Woe unto thee, Chorazin! woe unto thee, Bethsaida! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon, which have been done in you, they had a great while ago repented, sitting in sackcloth and ashes.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Koraaziine katamau, neeyyo aayye7ana; Beetasaida katamau, neeyyookka aayye7ana; aissi giikko, intte bolli Xoossai oottido malaatai Xiiroosa katamaaninne Sidoona kataman oosettidobaa gidiyaakko, eti waaruwaa maayidi, bidinttaa tisttidi, beni bantta nagaraappe simmanaagaa shin;

English Sentences: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment, than for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: pirddaa gallassi Xoossai intteppe Xiiroosa katamaunne Sidoona katamau pirddaa kehissana.

English Sentences: And thou, Capernaum, which art exalted to heaven, shalt be thrust down to hell.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Qifirinaahooma katamau, neeni saluwaa pude xoqqu gaanau koyadii? Neeni Si7ooliyaa duge wodhdhana.

English Sentences: He that heareth you heareth me; and he that despiseth you despiseth me; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte giyoobaa siyiya asi taani giyoobaa siyees; inttena ixxiya urai tana ixxees; tana ixxiya urai tana kiittidaagaakka ixxees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the seventy returned again with joy, saying, Lord, even the devils are subject unto us through thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappun tammu asati, "Godau, harai atto xalahetikka ne sunttan nuussi azazettidosona" yaagiiddi ufaissan simmidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etassi hagaadan yaagiis; "Seexaanai wolqqanttadan saluwaappe kunddishin, taani be7aas.

English Sentences: Behold, I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy: and nothing shall by any means hurt you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte shooshshaanne masimasuwaa yedhdhidi hemettana mala, morkkiyaa wolqqaa ubbaa bolli inttessi godatettaa immaas. Inttena qohiyaabi aibinne baawa.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not, that the spirits are subject unto you; but rather rejoice, because your names are written in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tuna ayyaanai inttessi azazettiyo gishshau ufaittoppite; shin intte sunttai saluwan xaafettido gishshau ufaittite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit, and said, I thank thee, O Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them unto babes: even so, Father; for so it seemed good in thy sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi he wode Geeshsha Ayyaanan ufaittidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Ta Aawau, saluwaa sa7aa Godau, neeni hagaa aadhdhida eranchchatuppenne akeekanchchatuppe genttada, erenna naatussi qonccissido gishshau, nena galatais; ee, ta Aawau, aissi giikko, hegee ne shenedan oosettiis.

English Sentences: All things are delivered to me of my Father: and no man knoweth who the Son is, but the Father; and who the Father is, but the Son, and he to whom the Son will reveal him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta Aawai taassi ubbabaa immiis; Aawaappe harai ooninne Na7ai oonakko erenna; Na7aappenne Na7ai Aawaa bessanau koyiyo asatuppe attin, harai ooninne Aawai oonakko erenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he turned him unto his disciples, and said privately, Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratukko guyye simmidi, eta xalaalaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Intte be7iyoogaa be7iyaageeti anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: For I tell you, that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see, and have not seen them; and to hear those things which ye hear, and have not heard them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttessi yootiyoogee aibee giikko, hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe darotinne kawoti intte be7iyoogaa be7anau koyidosona; shin be7ibookkona; intte siyiyoogaakka siyanau koyidosona; shin siyibookkona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, a certain lawyer stood up, and tempted him, saying, Master, what shall I do to inherit eternal life?
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiya issoi Yesuusa paaccanau akko yiidi, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, taani merinaa de7uwaa laattanau ai oottoo?" yaagidi a oichchiis.

English Sentences: He said unto him, What is written in the law? how readest thou?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Higgiyan xaafettidaagee aibee? Neeni ai nabbabai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he answering said, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy strength, and with all thy mind; and thy neighbour as thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee zaaridi, "Neeni Godaa ne Xoossaa ne kumetta wozanaappenne ne kumetta shemppuwaappe, ne kumetta wolqqaappenne ne kumetta qofaappe siiqa; ne shooruwaakka ne huuphedan siiqa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, Thou hast answered right: this do, and thou shalt live.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi a, "Neeni giyoogee tuma; hegaa ootta; neeni merinau de7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But he, willing to justify himself, said unto Jesus, And who is my neighbour?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin higgiyaa tamaarissiyaagee bana xillissanau koyidi Yesuusa, "Ta shooroi oonee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering said, A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho, and fell among thieves, which stripped him of his raiment, and wounded him, and departed, leaving him half dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Issi bitanee Yerusalaameppe Yarkko bees; biishin, panggati a bolli kiyidosona. Eti a maayuwaa qaari ekkidi, a shocidi, haiquwaappenne paxaappe gidduwan yeggidi biidosona.

English Sentences: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way: and when he saw him, he passed by on the other side.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi qeesee qaadadan he ogiyaara biiddi, he bitaniyaa be7iis; be7idi a yeggi bayidi, harasaara aadhdhiis.

English Sentences: And likewise a Levite, when he was at the place, came and looked on him, and passed by on the other side.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi Leewa zaree he sohuwaara biiddi, bitaniyaa be7idi, yeggi bayidi, harasaara aadhdhiis.

English Sentences: But a certain Samaritan, as he journeyed, came where he was: and when he saw him, he had compassion on him,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Samaariyaa asa issoi he ogiyaara biiddi, akko yiis. A be7idi, ayyo qarettiis.

English Sentences: And went to him, and bound up his wounds, pouring in oil and wine, and set him on his own beast, and brought him to an inn, and took care of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akko shiiqidi, zaitiyaanne woiniyaa eessaa a masunttaa bolli tigidi, qachchiis. Ba hariyaa togissidi, imattai aqiyo sohuwaa efiis; efiidi a maaddiiddi aqiis.

English Sentences: And on the morrow when he departed, he took out two pence, and gave them to the host, and said unto him, Take care of him; and whatsoever thou spendest more, when I come again, I will repay thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi naa77u shilinggiyaa kessidi, imattai aqiyo sohuwaa naagiyaagaassi immidi, A naaga; neeni aani wurssiyo miishshai aappuna gidikkonne, taani guyye simmiyo wode, neessi qanxxana yaagiis.

English Sentences: Which now of these three, thinkest thou, was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaatin he panggati shocido bitaniyaassi ha heezzu asatuppe augee shoorotiyai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, He that shewed mercy on him. Then said Jesus unto him, Go, and do thou likewise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin higgiyaa tamaarissiyaagee, "Ayyo kehidaagee shoorotees" yaagiis. Yaagin Yesuusi a, "Baada neenikka hegaadan ootta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now it came to pass, as they went, that he entered into a certain village: and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusinne i erissiyo ashkkarati biishin, i issi qeeri katamaa gelin, issi Martto giyo maccaasiyaa a ba son mokkaasu.

English Sentences: And she had a sister called Mary, which also sat at Jesus' feet, and heard his word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Marttissi Mairaamo giyo michchiyaa de7iyaara Yesuusa tohuwaa matan uttada, a qaalaa siyausu.

English Sentences: But Martha was cumbered about much serving, and came to him, and said, Lord, dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone? bid her therefore that she help me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Martta baassi oosoi darido gishshau, ba wozana giddon daro metootaasu. Yesuusakko shiiqada, "Godau, taani ha ubba oosuwaa oottishin, ta michchiyaa utta bayidoogaa qoppikkii? Yaatikko o tana maadda ga" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said unto her, Martha, Martha, thou art careful and troubled about many things:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi o, "Marttee, Marttee, neeni daroban hirggaasa; qassi tuggataasa.

English Sentences: But one thing is needful: and Mary hath chosen that good part, which shall not be taken away from her.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin koshshiyaagee issibaa; Mairaama baappe ooninne ekkenna lo77obaa dooraasu" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, as he was praying in a certain place, when he ceased, one of his disciples said unto him, Lord, teach us to pray, as John also taught his disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi issi sohuwan woossees. Woosaa wurssido wode, i erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi, "Godau, Yohaannisi ba erissiyo ashkkarata tamaarissidoogaadan, nuuni woigi woossanaakko, nuna tamaarissa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, When ye pray, say, Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name. Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done, as in heaven, so in earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Xoossaa woossiiddi, hagaadan yaagite; Saluwan de7iya nu Aawau, ne geeshsha sunttai anjjetto. Ne kawotettai yo. Ne shenee saluwan hanidoogaadan, sa7ankka hano.

English Sentences: Give us day by day our daily bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchi hachchi koshshiya qumaa nuuyyo hachchi imma.

English Sentences: And forgive us our sins; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us. And lead us not into temptation; but deliver us from evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nuna naaqqidaageetuyyo ubbaa atto giido gishshau, neenikka nu naaquwaa atto ga. Nuna iitabaappe ashshanaappe attin, paacen gelissoppa yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Which of you shall have a friend, and shall go unto him at midnight, and say unto him, Friend, lend me three loaves;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata hagaadan yaagiis; "Geelladan hai intteppe issoi qamma bilahe ba lagge asa soo biidi, Ta ishau, taassi heezzu baso oitta tal77a.

English Sentences: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me, and I have nothing to set before him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta laggee ogeppe ta soo yiis; taani a sintti aattiyoobi baawa yaagikko,

English Sentences: And he from within shall answer and say, Trouble me not: the door is now shut, and my children are with me in bed; I cannot rise and give thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: a laggee sooppe haasayiiddi, Tana daafurssoppa; karee gorddettiichchiis; ta naatikka tanaara hiixan de7oosona; taani denddada, neessi ainne immanau danddayikke yaaganee?

English Sentences: I say unto you, Though he will not rise and give him, because he is his friend, yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttessi odiyoogee aibee giikko, i a lagge gidido gishshau, denddi eqqidi, ayyo ainne immennan ixxikkokka, a laggee a oichchiiddi waissido gishshau, denddidi i koyiyoobaa ubbaa immana.

English Sentences: And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani inttessi odais; woossite, intte ekkana; koyite, intte demmana; kare yiidi xeesite; karee intteyyo dooyettana.

English Sentences: For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, woossiya ubbai ekkana; koyiya urai demmana; qassi kare yiidi xeesiya urau karee dooyettana.

English Sentences: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father, will he give him a stone? or if he ask a fish, will he for a fish give him a serpent?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte giddon ba na7i, Quma imma giikko, shuchcha immana aawi de7ii? Mole imma giikko shooshsha immanee?

English Sentences: Or if he shall ask an egg, will he offer him a scorpion?
Wolaitta Sentences: Woi, PHuuphulle imma giikko masimaso immanee?

English Sentences: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children: how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte iita gidiiddi, intte naatussi lo77obaa immiyoogaa erikko, yaatin saluwan de7iya Aawai bana woossiyaageetussi Geeshsha Ayyaanaa waati darissidi immanddeeshsha?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he was casting out a devil, and it was dumb. And it came to pass, when the devil was gone out, the dumb spake; and the people wondered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi bitaniyaappe duude xalahiyaa kessiis; xalahee kiyidoogaappe guyyiyan, bitanee haasayaa doommin, asai garamettiis.

English Sentences: But some of them said, He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin etappe issoi issoi, "Xalahetu halaqaa Bi7eeli-Zeebuli baayyo wolqqaa immin, xalaheta kessees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And others, tempting him, sought of him a sign from heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harati a paaccanau i saluwaappe malaataa oottana mala koyidosona.

English Sentences: But he, knowing their thoughts, said unto them, Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation; and a house divided against a house falleth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eta qofaa eridi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Ba giddon shaakettiya kawotetta ubbai xayana; shaakettiya keettaikka kunddana.

English Sentences: If Satan also be divided against himself, how shall his kingdom stand? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Seexaanaa kawotettai ba giddon shaakettikko, he kawotettai waanidi eqqanee? Intte tana, Bi7eeli-Zeebuli neessi wolqqaa immin, xalaheta kessaasa yaageeta.

English Sentences: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils, by whom do your sons cast them out? therefore shall they be your judges.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tau Bi7eeli-Zeebuli wolqqaa immin, taani xalaheta kessiyaabaa gidikko, intte asau wolqqaa ooni immin, xalaheta kessanee? Hegaa gishshau, eti intte bolli pirddana.

English Sentences: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils, no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai tau wolqqaa immin, taani xalaheta kessiyaabaa gidikko, simmi Xoossaa kawotettai inttekko yiichchiis.

English Sentences: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace, his goods are in peace:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tooraanne gonddalliyaa oiqqida mino bitanee ba keettaa naagikko, a mehee saro de7ana.

English Sentences: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him, and overcome him, he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted, and divideth his spoils.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin appe minniyaagee yiidi, a xoonidi i ammani uttido tooraanne gonddalliyaa appe wotti ekkidi, a mehiyaa shaakkees.

English Sentences: He that is not with me is against me: and he that gathereth not with me scattereth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta bagga gidenna urai tabaa ixxees; qassi tanaara issippe shiishshennaagee laalees.

English Sentences: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man, he walketh through dry places, seeking rest; and finding none, he saith, I will return unto my house whence I came out.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tuna ayyaanai asappe kiyiyo wode, baayyo shemppiyoosaa koyiiddi, haatti bainnasaara aadhdhees; au beettennan ixxikko, Taani aggada yiido ta keettaa simmana yaagees;

English Sentences: And when he cometh, he findeth it swept and garnished.
Wolaitta Sentences: simmidi yiyo wode, keettai pitettidi, giigi uttidaagaa demmees.

English Sentences: Then goeth he, and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself; and they enter in, and dwell there: and the last state of that man is worse than the first.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, biidi baappe iitiya laappun hara ayyaanata ehees; he ayyaanati gelidi, hegan de7oosona; he bitaniyaa de7oi kaseegaappe guyyeegee keehi iitees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as he spake these things, a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice, and said unto him, Blessed is the womb that bare thee, and the paps which thou hast sucked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hagaa gin, asaa giddoppe issi maccaasiyaa qaalaa xoqqu oottada, "Nena tookkida uloinne neeni xammido xanttai anjjettidaageeta" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: But he said, Yea rather, blessed are they that hear the word of God, and keep it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi, "Anjjettidaageeti Xoossaa qaalaa siyidi, he qaalai azaziyoogaadan oottiyaageeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the people were gathered thick together, he began to say, This is an evil generation: they seek a sign; and there shall no sign be given it, but the sign of Jonas the prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai shiiqido wode, Yesuusi hagaadan yaaganau doommiis; "Malaataa koyiya ha wodiyaa asai iita; hananabaa yootiya Yoonaasa malaataappe harai ayyo imettenna.

English Sentences: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites, so shall also the Son of man be to this generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoonaasi Nanawe katamaa asaassi malaata gididoogaadan, taani Asa Na7ai, ha wodiyaa asaassi malaata gidana.

English Sentences: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation, and condemn them: for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and, behold, a greater than Solomon is here.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tohossa bagga biittaa kawiyaa Solomona aadhdhida eratettaa siyanau sa7aa gaxaappe yiido gishshau, pirddaa gallassi denddada, ha wodiyaa asaa mootana; be7ite; Solomonappekka aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees.

English Sentences: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: for they repented at the preaching of Jonas; and, behold, a greater than Jonas is here.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nanawe asai Yoonaasi yootidoogan bantta nagaraappe simmido gishshau, pirddaa gallassi denddidi, intte bolli pirddana; be7ite; Yoonaasappe aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees.

English Sentences: No man, when he hath lighted a candle, putteth it in a secret place, neither under a bushel, but on a candlestick, that they which come in may see the light.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Soo geliya asaassi poo7ana mala, xomppiyaa xomppidi, xoqqan wottanaappe attin, genttidi woikko keriyan qum77idi wottiyai ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: The light of the body is the eye: therefore when thine eye is single, thy whole body also is full of light; but when thine eye is evil, thy body also is full of darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne aifee ne bollaassi xomppe mala; ne aifee payya gidiyo wode ne bolla ubbai poo7o; shin ne aifee payya gidana xayikko, ne bollai xuma gidana.

English Sentences: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, ne bolli de7iya poo7oi xuma gidenna mala naagetta.

English Sentences: If thy whole body therefore be full of light, having no part dark, the whole shall be full of light, as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi ne bolla ubban ainne xumi bainnan kumetta poo7oi de7ikko, xomppee ba wagagga poo7uwaa ne bolli poo7issiyoogaadan, ne bollai wagagga poo7o gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as he spake, a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him: and he went in, and sat down to meat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi haasayaa wurssido wode, issi Parisaawee, "Tanaara laaxaa markkii" yaagidi a woossiis; woossin Yesuusi gelidi maanau uttiis.

English Sentences: And when the Pharisee saw it, he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laaxaa maanaappe kase Yesuusi kushiyaa meecettibeennaagaa be7idi, Parisaawee garamettiis.

English Sentences: And the Lord said unto him, Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Garamettin Godai a, "Parisaawetoo, shaatiyaayyoonne keriyaayyo bolla baggaa geeshsheeta; shin intteyyo giddoora bonqqiyoogeenne iitatettai kumi uttiis.

English Sentences: Ye fools, did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eeyyatoo, gaxaa medhdhida Xoossai gidduwaa medhdhibeenneeyye?

English Sentences: But rather give alms of such things as ye have; and, behold, all things are clean unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte siiniyaaninne sainiyan de7iyaagaa hiyyeesaassi immite; inttessi ubbabaikka geeshsha gidana.

English Sentences: But woe unto you, Pharisees! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs, and pass over judgment and the love of God: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin Parisaawetoo, intteyyo aayye7ana! Aissi giikko, bootta sawuwaappe, karetta sawuwaappe, xalotiyaappenne tokkidobaa ubbaappe asirataa Xoossaayyo intte immeeta; shin xillotettaanne Xoossaa siiqiyoogaa intte aggi bayeeta; haratakka aggennan, oottanau bessiya yohoti hageeta.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, Pharisees! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues, and greetings in the markets.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Parisaawetoo, Aihuda woosa keettan intte bonchcho sohuwan uttanau koyiyo gishshaunne giyan bonchcho sarotaa koyiyo gishshau inttessi aayye7ana.

English Sentences: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye are as graves which appear not, and the men that walk over them are not aware of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lo77o misatiya iitatoo, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoo, Parisaawetoo, inttessi aayye7ana; aissi giikko, intte asi erennan yedhdhi hemettiyo beettenna duufo misateeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then answered one of the lawyers, and said unto him, Master, thus saying thou reproachest us also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe issoi a, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, neeni hegaa yaagiyoogan nuna qassi cayaasattennee" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Woe unto you also, ye lawyers! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne, and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoo, inttessi aayye7ana; aissi giikko, tookkanau deexxiya toohuwaa asa toosseeta; shin tookkiya asa maaddanau harai atto, intte intte huuphen biradhdhiyankka he toohuwaa bochchekketa.

English Sentences: Woe unto you! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets, and your fathers killed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte aawati worido hananabaa yootiyaageetussi duufuwaa bolli keettaa intte keexxiyo gishshau, inttessi aayye7ana.

English Sentences: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers: for they indeed killed them, and ye build their sepulchres.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi intte aawati hananabaa yootiyaageeta worin, intte eta duufuwaa bolli keettaa keexxiyo gishshau, Eta oosoi lo77o yaagidi, etabaa markkatteeta.

English Sentences: Therefore also said the wisdom of God, I will send them prophets and apostles, and some of them they shall slay and persecute:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossaa aadhdhida eratettai, Taani hananabaa yootiyaageetanne kiitettidaageeta etakko kiittana; kiittidoogeetuppe issuwaa issuwaa eti worana; issuwaa issuwaa tuggayana yaagiis.

English Sentences: That the blood of all the prophets, which was shed from the foundation of the world, may be required of this generation;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aabeela woroosappe doommidi, yarshshiyoosaappenne Beeta Maqidasiyaappe gidduwan worido zakkaariyaasa wodiyaa gakkanaashin, sa7ai merettoosappe doommidi gukkida hananabaa yootiya ubbatu suuttaa gishshau, ha wodiyaa asai qaxxayettanau bessees;
