English Sentences: And as they heard these things, he added and spake a parable, because he was nigh to Jerusalem, and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai hegaa siyiyo wode, Yesuusi Yerusalaame matido gishshaunne etassi Xoossaa kawotettai beettana matidobaa milatido gishshau, etassi leemisuwaa yootiis.

English Sentences: He said therefore, A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom, and to return.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, hagaadan yaagiis; "Issi gita asi baassi kawotettaa ekkidi yaanau, haaho dere biis.

English Sentences: And he called his ten servants, and delivered them ten pounds, and said unto them, Occupy till I come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba ashkkaratuppe tammata xeesidi, Taani yaanaashin, hagan zal77ite yaagidi, tammu paunddiyaa etassi immiis.

English Sentences: But his citizens hated him, and sent a message after him, saying, We will not have this man to reign over us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin a biittaa asai a ixxidi, Hagee nu bolli kawotanau koyokko yaagiiddi, asaa a geeduwaa kiittiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that when he was returned, having received the kingdom, then he commanded these servants to be called unto him, to whom he had given the money, that he might know how much every man had gained by trading.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He gita asi kawotettaa ekkidi simmiis. Simmidi ba miishshaa immido ashkkarati zal77idi, huuphiyan huuphiyan woqqaa worissidaakko eranau, eta baakko xeegissiis.

English Sentences: Then came the first, saying, Lord, thy pound hath gained ten pounds.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xeegettida ashkkaratuppe koiroogee yiidi, Ta godau, ne miishshai tammu paundde wodhdhiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, Well, thou good servant: because thou hast been faithful in a very little, have thou authority over ten cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: "A godai a, Hayyanaashsho! Neeni lo77o ashkkara; neeni ha qii guuttaban ammanettidaagaa gidido gishshau, taani nena tammu katamatuyyo alaafe oottana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the second came, saying, Lord, thy pound hath gained five pounds.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Naa77anttoi yiidi, Ta godau, ne miishshai ichchashu paundde wodhdhiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said likewise to him, Be thou also over five cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: "A godai a, Neenikka ichchashu katamatuyyo alaafe gida yaagiis.

English Sentences: And another came, saying, Lord, behold, here is thy pound, which I have kept laid up in a napkin:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Heezzanttoi yiidi, Taani curqqan xaaxada naaga wottido ne paunddiyo hanno be7a.

English Sentences: For I feared thee, because thou art an austere man: thou takest up that thou layedst not down, and reapest that thou didst not sow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni meqetti bainna asa gidiyo gishshau, neessi yayyaas. Neeni nebaa gidennabaa ekkaasa; zerabeennabaakka cakkaasa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he saith unto him, Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee, thou wicked servant. Thou knewest that I was an austere man, taking up that I laid not down, and reaping that I did not sow:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaagin, Neeni iita ashkkara; ne doonai haasayidoban nena taani pirddana. Taani tabaa gidennabaa ekkiyaagaa, qassi zerabeennabaa cakkiya meqetti bainna asa gidiyoogaa eradasa.

English Sentences: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank, that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin ta miishshaa aissi dichchau immabeikkii? Taani simmiyo wode ta miishshaa woriyaara ekkanaagaa shin attiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them that stood by, Take from him the pound, and give it to him that hath ten pounds.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He sohuwan eqqida asata, He paunddiyaa appe wotti ekkidi, tammu paunddee de7iyoogaayyo immite yaagiis.

English Sentences: (And they said unto him, Lord, he hath ten pounds.)
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaagin, Godau, ayyo tammu paunddee de7ees yaagidosona.

English Sentences: For I say unto you, That unto every one which hath shall be given; and from him that hath not, even that he hath shall be taken away from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo odais; de7iyo ubbau harai gujettana; shin bainnaagaappe harai atto, he de7iyaageekka appe ekettiichchana.

English Sentences: But those mine enemies, which would not that I should reign over them, bring hither, and slay them before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha bantta bolli taani kawotana mala dosibeenna ta morkketa haa ehiidi, ta sinttan goora7ite giis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had thus spoken, he went before, ascending up to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi hagaadan yaagidi haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan, etappe sinttatidi, Yerusalaame biis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany, at the mount called the mount of Olives, he sent two of his disciples,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Dabira Zaite giyo deriyaa lanqqiyan de7iya Beetafaaganne Biitaaniyaa giyo katamata matido wode, erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77aa kiittidi,

English Sentences: Saying, Go ye into the village over against you; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied, whereon yet never man sat: loose him, and bring him hither.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intteppe sinttan de7iya qeeri katamaa biite; biidi yaa gelosaara biron ooninne mulekka toggibeenna qashuwan de7iya hare maraa intte demmana; a birshshidi, haa ekki yiite.

English Sentences: And if any man ask you, Why do ye loose him? thus shall ye say unto him, Because the Lord hath need of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne inttena, Hegaa aissi birshsheetii? yaagidi oichchikko, Godai hagaa koyees yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they that were sent went their way, and found even as he had said unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitettidaageeti biidi, Yesuusi banttassi odidoogaadan demmidosona.

English Sentences: And as they were loosing the colt, the owners thereof said unto them, Why loose ye the colt?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hare maraa birshshishin, a godati, "Hare maraa aissi birshsheetii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they said, The Lord hath need of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti, "Godai hagaa koyees" yaagidi,

English Sentences: And they brought him to Jesus: and they cast their garments upon the colt, and they set Jesus thereon.
Wolaitta Sentences: hare maraa Yesuusakko ehiidi, bantta maayuwaa a zokkuwan hiixxidi, Yesuusa togissidosona.

English Sentences: And as he went, they spread their clothes in the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi toggidi biishin, bantta maayuwaa i biyo ogiyan hiixxidosona.

English Sentences: And when he was come nigh, even now at the descent of the mount of Olives, the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen;
Wolaitta Sentences: I Dabira Zaite Deriyaa dugettaa wodhdhana matishin, a kaalliya ubbai Xoossai oottido malaata ubbaa be7ido gishshau ufaittidi, Xoossaa galatanau bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi,

English Sentences: Saying, Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord: peace in heaven, and glory in the highest.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Godaa sunttan yiya kawoi anjjettidaagaa; saluwan sarotettai gido. Qassi salo ubbaappe bolla saluwan de7iya Xoossai bonchchetto" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him, Master, rebuke thy disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa giddoppe issi issi Parisaaweti Yesuusa, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, ne erissiyo ashkkarata haizzite giikkii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he answered and said unto them, I tell you that, if these should hold their peace, the stones would immediately cry out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani intteyyo odais; hageeti co77u giikko, shuchchaikka waassana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he was come near, he beheld the city, and wept over it,
Wolaitta Sentences: Katamaa gakkanau i matidi, katamaa be7ido wode qarettidi yeekkiiddi,

English Sentences: Saying, If thou hadst known, even thou, at least in this thy day, the things which belong unto thy peace! but now they are hid from thine eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: hagaadan yaagiis; "Sarotettai yiyo ogiyaa hachchi nenakkonne erarkkiishsha! SHin ha77i hegee ne aifiyaappe geemmiis.

English Sentences: For the days shall come upon thee, that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee, and compass thee round, and keep thee in on every side,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ne bolli yaana wodee de7ees; he wode ne morkketi urqqaa nukkidi, godaa essana. He godan nena yuushshi aattidi diridi, ubba baggaara neeyyo ogiyaa gorddana.

English Sentences: And shall lay thee even with the ground, and thy children within thee; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenanne ne dirssaa giddon de7iya ne asaa mentterettana. Xoossai nena be7anau yiido wodiyaa neeni akeekabeenna gishshau, ne morkketi shuchcha ubbaa issuwaa issuwaa bollaappe denttidi laalana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he went into the temple, and began to cast out them that sold therein, and them that bought;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi, hegan zal77iyaageeta, "Xoossaa maxaafan,

English Sentences: Saying unto them, It is written, My house is the house of prayer: but ye have made it a den of thieves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta keettai Xoossaa woossiyo keetta gidana geetettidi xaafetti uttiis; shin intte a panggati qosettiyo gonggolo kessideta" yaagidi eta yedetaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And he taught daily in the temple. But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ubba gallassi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissees. Qeese halaqati, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne gita asai a xaissanau koyoosona.

English Sentences: And could not find what they might do: for all the people were very attentive to hear him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asai ubbai a haasayaappe issoi attennan ezggi uttido gishshau, a woriyo ogee etau xayiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that on one of those days, as he taught the people in the temple, and preached the gospel, the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders,
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Yesuusi asaa tamaarissiiddinne wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi Beeta Maqidasiyan de7ishin, qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti cimatuura issippe akko yiidi a,

English Sentences: And spake unto him, saying, Tell us, by what authority doest thou these things? or who is he that gave thee this authority?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni hagaa oottanau neeyyo ai alaafetetti de7ii? Woi neeyyo ha alaafetettaa immidai oonee? Ane nuussi oda" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he answered and said unto them, I will also ask you one thing; and answer me:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, "Taani qassi inttena issibaa oichchais; taassi odite;

English Sentences: The baptism of John, was it from heaven, or of men?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi xammaqiyo alaafetettaa ekkidoi Xoossaappeeyye woi asappee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then believed ye him not?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta giddon palamaa doommidi, "Nuuni woiganee? Xoossaappe yiis yaagikko, i nuna, Yaatin Yohaannisi yootidoogaa aissi ammanibeekketii? yaagana.

English Sentences: But and if we say, Of men; all the people will stone us: for they be persuaded that John was a prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni, Asappe yiis yaagikko, ha asai ubbai Yohaannisi hananabaa yootiyaagaa gididoogaa eri uttido gishshau, nuna shuchchan caddana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they answered, that they could not tell whence it was.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau eti, "He alaafetettaa i awappe ekkidaakkonne nuuni erokko" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto them, Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Taanikka hagaa ai alaafetettan oottiyaakko, intteyyo odikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then began he to speak to the people this parable; A certain man planted a vineyard, and let it forth to husbandmen, and went into a far country for a long time.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi asaassi ha leemisuwaa yootiis; "Asa issoi woiniyaa turaanne tokkido sohuwaa kottau immidi, haaho dere biidi, daro gam77iis.

English Sentences: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen, that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard: but the husbandmen beat him, and sent him away empty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa aifiyaa maxiyo wodee gakkin, woiniyaa aifiyaappe bana gakkiyaagaa ekkidi yaana mala, issi ashkkaraa ba kottaawatukko kiittiis; shin kottaawati a ashkkaraa wadhdhidi, kushe mela yedettidosona.

English Sentences: And again he sent another servant: and they beat him also, and entreated him shamefully, and sent him away empty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi hara ashkkaraa etakko kiittiis. Eti akka wadhdhidi kaushshidi, kushe mela yeddidosona.

English Sentences: And again he sent a third: and they wounded him also, and cast him out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi heezzantto ashkkaraa kiittiis. Kiittidoogaa masunxxissidi, woiniyaa turaa giddoppe gaxi kessi olidosona.

English Sentences: Then said the lord of the vineyard, What shall I do? I will send my beloved son: it may be they will reverence him when they see him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Woiniyaa turaa godai, Yaatin taani waatoo? Taani siiqiyo ta na7aa kiittana; eti a bonchchanaakkonne ooni erii yaagidi qoppiis.

English Sentences: But when the husbandmen saw him, they reasoned among themselves, saying, This is the heir: come, let us kill him, that the inheritance may be ours.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin kottaawati a be7idi, bantta giddon haasayiiddi, Hagaa laattanaagee a; gadiyaa nuuni laattanau a woroos yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So they cast him out of the vineyard, and killed him. What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them?
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7aa woiniyaa turaa giddoppe gaxaa kessidi woridosona. "Simmi woiniyaa turaa godai eta waatanee?

English Sentences: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen, and shall give the vineyard to others. And when they heard it, they said, God forbid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidi, he kottaa oottiyaageeta wori wurssidi, woiniyaa turaa kottaa oottiya hara asau immana" yaagiis. Asai hegaa siyidi, "Hegee hanoppo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he beheld them, and said, What is this then that is written, The stone which the builders rejected, the same is become the head of the corner?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etakko xeellidi, "Yaatin, Gimbbiyaageeti karidi ixxido shuchchai godaa xaphuwaa minttiya, ubbaappe aadhdhiya shuchcha gidiis geetettidi maxaafan xaafettidaagee hegee aibee?

English Sentences: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken; but on whomsoever it shall fall, it will grind him to powder.
Wolaitta Sentences: He shuchchaa bolli kunddiya ubbai meqerettana; shin he shuchchai asa bolli kunddikko, he kunddido uraa gaaccana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him; and they feared the people: for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne qeese halaqati Yesuusi ha leemisuwaa bantta bolli odidoogaa erido gishshau, he wode a oiqqanau koyidosona; shin asaassi yayyidosona.

English Sentences: And they watched him, and sent forth spies, which should feign themselves just men, that they might take hold of his words, that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaassi injjetiya wodiyaa naagidi, Yesuusa haasayissiiddi, a doonaappe balabaa demmidi, a oiqqinne deriyaa haariyaagaa wolqqaassinne a alaafetettaassi aattidi immana mala, xillo milatiiddi xillo gidenna kafota akko yeddidosona.

English Sentences: And they asked him, saying, Master, we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly, neither acceptest thou the person of any, but teachest the way of God truly:
Wolaitta Sentences: He kafoti Yesuusa, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, neeni haasayiyoogeenne tamaarissiyoogee likke gidiyoogaa nuuni eroos; neeni Xoossaa ogiyaa tumatettan tamaarissiyoogaappe attin, asa shaakkennaagaa eroos.

English Sentences: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar, or no?
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaarayyo giiraa giiriyoogee wogeeyye woga gidennee?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: But he perceived their craftiness, and said unto them, Why tempt ye me?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi eti cimmiyo cimuwaa eridi, "Tana aissi paacceetii?

English Sentences: Shew me a penny. Whose image and superscription hath it? They answered and said, Caesar's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi santtimiyaa tana bessite; ha santtimiyaa bolli de7iya merainne sunttai oogee?" yaagidi eta oichchiis. Oichchin, eti zaaridi, "Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaaraagaa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar's, and unto God the things which be God's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Yaatikko Qeesaaraagaa Qeesaarassi, Xoossaagaa Xoossaassi immite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they could not take hold of his words before the people: and they marvelled at his answer, and held their peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa sinttan a haasayan a oiqqiyoobaa demmanau danddayibookkona; hegaa gishshau, i zaarido zaaruwan garamettidi, co77u giidosona.

English Sentences: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection; and they asked him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqida asi denddenna giya Saaduqaawetuppe issi issi asati Yesuusakko yiidi,

English Sentences: Saying, Master, Moses wrote unto us, If any man's brother die, having a wife, and he die without children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: hagaadan yaagidi, a oichchidosona; "Tamaarissiyaagoo, Muusee nuuyyo higgiyaa xaafiiddi, Machcho ekkida asi na7a yelennan haiqqikko, he haiqqidaagaa ishai a machchiyo aissidi, ba ishaayyo na7a yelanau bessees yaagiyaagaa xaafiis.

English Sentences: There were therefore seven brethren: and the first took a wife, and died without children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi wode laappun ishantti de7iyaageetuppe bairai machchiyo ekkidi, na7a yelennan haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And the second took her to wife, and he died childless.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqin naa77anttoi o aissiis;

English Sentences: And the third took her; and in like manner the seven also: and they left no children, and died.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi heezzanttoikka o aissiis; hegaadan laappunatikka na7a yelennan haiqqidosona.

English Sentences: Last of all the woman died also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, qassi he maccaasiyaa haiqqaasu.

English Sentences: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she? for seven had her to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin haiqqida asai haiquwaappe denddiyo gallassi, a etappe augaayyo machcho gidanee? Aissi giikko, laappunatikka o ekkidosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jesus answering said unto them, The children of this world marry, and are given in marriage:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi zaaridi, etassi hagaadan yaagiis; "Ha wodiyaa asai machchiyo ekkees; maccaageeti azinaa geloosona.

English Sentences: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world, and the resurrection from the dead, neither marry, nor are given in marriage:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin haiquwaappe denddidi, sinttappe yiya wodiyan de7anau bessiya attumaasainne maccaasai ekkennanne gelenna.

English Sentences: Neither can they die any more: for they are equal unto the angels; and are the children of God, being the children of the resurrection.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti kiitanchchatu mala gidiyo gishshau, naa77anttuwaa haiqqanau danddayokkona. Qassi eti haiquwaappe denddido gishshau, Xoossaa naata.

English Sentences: Now that the dead are raised, even Moses shewed at the bush, when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin haiqqida asai denddanabaa Muusee geeshshidi erissiis. Xaragettiya buuraabaa odiya sohuwankka Godaabaa i yootiiddi, Abrahaama Xoossaa, Yisaaqa Xoossaa, Yaaqooba Xoossaa yaagiis.

English Sentences: For he is not a God of the dead, but of the living: for all live unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbai ayyo merinau de7iyaageeta gidido gishshau, Xoossai merinau de7iyaageetu Xoossaa gidiyoogaappe attin, haiqqidaageetu Xoossaa gidenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then certain of the scribes answering said, Master, thou hast well said.
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe issoi issoi Yesuusa, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, neeni giidoogee lo77o" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, naa77anttuwaa issibaakka a oichchanau xalibookkona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, How say they that Christ is David's son?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qassi eta yaagiis; "Eti woigidi Kiristtoosa Daawita na7a giyoonaa?

English Sentences: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms, The LORD said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Daawiti Mazamure Maxaafan, Godai ta Godaa;

English Sentences: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani ne morkketa neeni yedhdha eqqiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi, hagan taappe ushachcha baggaara utta" giis yaagiis.

English Sentences: David therefore calleth him Lord, how is he then his son?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Daawiti Kiristtoosa, Godaa giidi xeesikko, yaatin Kiristtoosi waanidi, Daawita na7a gidii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata asai ubbai siyishin,

English Sentences: Beware of the scribes, which desire to walk in long robes, and love greetings in the markets, and the highest seats in the synagogues, and the chief rooms at feasts;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe naagettite; eti adussa maayuwaa maayidi yuuyiyoogaanne giyaa sohuwankka asai eta bonchchidi sarotiyoogaanne dosoosona; Aihuda woosa keettan daro lo77iya oidiyaa dosoosona; asi banttana imattiyoosankka bonchcho sohuwaa dosoosona.

English Sentences: Which devour widows' houses, and for a shew make long prayers: the same shall receive greater damnation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti am77etu keettaa bonqqidi, banttau lo77o milatanau Xoossaa woosaa adussoosona; eti ubbaappe aadhdhiya pirddaa ekkana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he looked up, and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ubbasaa xeelliiddi, dure asai ba miishshaa Beeta Maqidasiyan muxuwaataa yeggiyo saaxiniyan yeggiyoogaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi daro hiyyeesa am77iyaa naa77u bakkannaa hegan yeggiyoogaa be7idi,

English Sentences: And he said, Of a truth I say unto you, that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo tumaa gais; ha hiyyeesa am77iyaa ubbaappe darissada yeggaasu.

English Sentences: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God: but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, hageeti ubbai bantta palahida miishshaappe yeggidosona; shin a ba pacaappe bau de7iya aquwaa muleera imma aggaasu" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as some spake of the temple, how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts, he said,
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issoi issoi Beeta Maqidasee lo77o shuchchaaninne Xoossaassi imettidaban lo77idaagaa haasayishin Yesuusi,

English Sentences: As for these things which ye behold, the days will come, in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha intte be7iyo ubbai issi shuchchi attennan, ubbai qolettana wodee yaana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they asked him, saying, Master, but when shall these things be? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati, "Tamaarissiyaagoo, yaatin, hegee aude hananee? Hegee hanana wodiyaa erissiya malaatai aiba gidanee?" yaagidi a oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, Take heed that ye be not deceived: for many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and the time draweth near: go ye not therefore after them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Baloppite; naagettite; aissi giikko, daro asati ta sunttan, Taani Kiristtoosa; wodee matattiis yaagiiddi, yaana. Eta kaallidi booppite.

English Sentences: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions, be not terrified: for these things must first come to pass; but the end is not by and by.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olanne ooshsha siyiyo wode dagammoppite; aissi giikko, hegaa mala yohoi koiroora hanana bessees; shin hegee wurssettai gakkana matiis giyoogaa gidenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said he unto them, Nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom:
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Yesuusi haasayiiddi, "Deree deriyaa bolli, kawotettai kawotettaa bolli denddana.

English Sentences: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places, and famines, and pestilences; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittai wolqqappe qaaxxiyoogee, daro sohuwan koshai, wurssiya harggee yaana. Yashissiyaabainne gita malaatai saluwaappe yaana.

English Sentences: But before all these, they shall lay their hands on you, and persecute you, delivering you up to the synagogues, and into prisons, being brought before kings and rulers for my name's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin ha ubbai hananaappe kase, eti inttena oiqqananne waissana; ta sunttaa gishshau, inttena Aihuda woosa keettaa asatuyyo aattidi immananne; qasho keettankka qashissana. Qassi inttena kawuwaa sinttinne deriyaa haariyaagaa sintti efaana.

English Sentences: And it shall turn to you for a testimony.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee inttessi ta gishshau, eta sinttan markkattanau lo77o wode gidana.

English Sentences: Settle it therefore in your hearts, not to meditate before what ye shall answer:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, issibaa intte wozanan oiqqite; hegee aibee giikko, intte waatidi zaaruwaa immanaakko, koiroora hirggoppite giyoogaa.

English Sentences: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, intte morkketuppe ooninne inttenaara eqettanaunne palamettanau danddayenna haasayaa minotettaanne aadhdhida eratettaa taani inttessi immana.

English Sentences: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents, and brethren, and kinsfolks, and friends; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harai atto inttena yelidaageetikka, ishantti, dabboti, laggetikka, inttena aattidi immana. Intteppekka issuwaa issuwaa eti worana.

English Sentences: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta sunttaa gishshau, inttena ubbai ixxana; shin

English Sentences: But there shall not an hair of your head perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: intte huuphiyaa binnaanaappe issoinne xayenna.

English Sentences: In your patience possess ye your souls.
Wolaitta Sentences: Danddayan intte intte shemppuwaa ashshana.

English Sentences: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies, then know that the desolation thereof is nigh.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin wotaaddaran Yerusalaamee diretti uttidaashin intte be7iyo wode, Yerusalaame xayoi matattidoogaa erana.

English Sentences: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Yihudan de7iyaageeti deriyaakko baqatona; katama giddon de7iyaageeti katamaappe kiyona; gaxa biittan de7iyaageeti katamaa geloppona.

English Sentences: For these be the days of vengeance, that all things which are written may be fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossaa maxaafatun xaafettidaagee ubbai polettanau, Xoossai halo kessiyo wodee hagaa.

English Sentences: But woe unto them that are with child, and to them that give suck, in those days! for there shall be great distress in the land, and wrath upon this people.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode shahaara maccaasatuyyoonne xanttiya maccaasatuyyo aayye7ana; aissi giikko, sa7aa bollan gita metoi yaana. Ha asaa bollankka iita hanqqoi yaana.

English Sentences: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword, and shall be led away captive into all nations: and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles, until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti qara bisuwan qanxxettidi haiqqana; eti dere ubban omoodettana; Aihuda gidenna asai bantta wode polettana gakkanaashin, Yerusalaame katamaa yedhdhana.

English Sentences: And there shall be signs in the sun, and in the moon, and in the stars; and upon the earth distress of nations, with perplexity; the sea and the waves roaring;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Awa aifiyaaninne aginan xoolinttiyan malaatai beettana; sa7an de7iya issi issi dere asai abbainne beetai guummiyoogaa siyidi, hananabai etassi erettennan ixxin metootana.

English Sentences: Men's hearts failing them for fear, and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth: for the powers of heaven shall be shaken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai sa7aa bolli yaanabaa ubbaa naagiiddi, yashshan daafurana; aissi giikko, saluwan de7iya wolqqati qaaxxana.

English Sentences: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani, Asa Na7ai, wolqqaaranne gita bonchchuwaara shaara giddoora yiishin, eti be7ana.

English Sentences: And when these things begin to come to pass, then look up, and lift up your heads; for your redemption draweth nigh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee hananau doommiyo wode, intte wozettiyo wodee matiyo gishshau, xoqqu giidi, pude xeellite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he spake to them a parable; Behold the fig tree, and all the trees;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi etassi hagaadan yaagidi, leemisuwaa yootiis; "Balasiyo giyo mittiyoonne hara mitta ubbaa akeekite.

English Sentences: When they now shoot forth, ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta haittai aacaa doommiyoogaa intte be7iyo wode, bonee matattidoogaa intte ereeta.

English Sentences: So likewise ye, when ye see these things come to pass, know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka intte hegee haniyoogaa be7iyo wode, Xoossaa kawotettai gakkana matattidoogaa erana.

English Sentences: Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass away, till all be fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intteyyo tumaa odais; ha ubbabai hanana gakkanaashin, ha wodiyaa asai haiqqiichchenna.

English Sentences: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloinne sa7ai aadhdhana; shin ta qaalai mulekka aadhdhenna.

English Sentences: And take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin muussan, ushshan, mattooninne aqossi hirggiyooban intte wozanai balenna mala, qassi intte qoppennan he gallassai intte bolli yeennaadan, inttena naagite.

English Sentences: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, he gallassai sa7a ubban de7iya asa ubbaa piriyaadan oiqqana.

English Sentences: Watch ye therefore, and pray always, that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass, and to stand before the Son of man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi intte he yaanabaa ubbaappe attanaunne ta sinttan Asa Na7aa sinttan, eqqanau danddayana mala, ubba wode Xoossaa woosan minnite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple; and at night he went out, and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi gallassi gallassi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissees; shin qammi qammi Dabira Zaite Deriyaa kiyidi aqees.

English Sentences: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple, for to hear him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa ubbai i tamaarissiyoogaa siyanau guuraara akko Beeta Maqidasiyaa yees.

English Sentences: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh, which is called the Passover.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oittaa miyo Paasikaa Baalaa gallassaa bonchchiyo wodee gakkana matiis.

English Sentences: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him; for they feared the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti asaassi yayyiyo gishshau, Yesuusa woriyo ogiyaa koyoosona.

English Sentences: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot, being of the number of the twelve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Seexaanai tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issuwan, Asqqoroota giyo Yihudan gelin,

English Sentences: And he went his way, and communed with the chief priests and captains, how he might betray him unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai biidi, qeese halaqatuuranne Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata azaziyaageetuura, "Yesuusa waata aattada immoo" giidi haasayiis.

English Sentences: And they were glad, and covenanted to give him money.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haasayin eti ufaittidi, Yihudaa, "Nuuni neessi miishsha immana" yaagidi odidosona.

English Sentences: And he promised, and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ero yaagidi, asi bainnasan etassi Yesuusa aattidi immanau injjetiya wodiyaa wochchees.

English Sentences: Then came the day of unleavened bread, when the passover must be killed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oittaa miyo gallassaa bonchchiyo wodee gakkiis. He gallassan Paasikaassi anqqara dorssa shukkanau bessees.

English Sentences: And he sent Peter and John, saying, Go and prepare us the passover, that we may eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi PHeexiroosanne Yohaannisa, "Nuuni Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassan maana qumaa biidi giigissite" yaagidi kiittiis.

English Sentences: And they said unto him, Where wilt thou that we prepare?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiittin, "Nuuni awan giigissanee?" yaagidi a oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Behold, when ye are entered into the city, there shall a man meet you, bearing a pitcher of water; follow him into the house where he entereth in.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Siyite; katamaa intte gelanau biishin, otuwan haattaa tookkida issi bitanee inttenaara gaittana. A kaallidi, i geliyo keettaa gelite.

English Sentences: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house, The Master saith unto thee, Where is the guestchamber, where I shall eat the passover with my disciples?
Wolaitta Sentences: Gelidi keettaawaa, Tamaarissiyaagee nena, "Taani ta erissiyo ashkkaratuura Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassan qumaa maanau imatta kifilee awaanee?" yaagees yaagite.

English Sentences: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished: there make ready.
Wolaitta Sentences: Keettaawai inttena pooqiyaa bollan de7iya makettida aaho kifiliyaa bessana. Hegan qumaa giigissite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they went, and found as he had said unto them: and they made ready the passover.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti biidi, Yesuusi banttau yootidoogaadan demmidi, yaani Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassi maana qumaa giigissidosona.

English Sentences: And when the hour was come, he sat down, and the twelve apostles with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qumaa miyo wodee gakkin, Yesuusi ba kiittido tammanne naa77atuura issippe maanau uttiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer:
Wolaitta Sentences: Uttidi yaagiis; "Taani waayettanaappe kasetada, inttenaara ha Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassan miyo qumaa maanau daro amottaas.

English Sentences: For I say unto you, I will not any more eat thereof, until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani inttessi odais; hegee Xoossaa kawotettan polettana gakkanaashin, taani naa77anttuwaa hegaa miikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took the cup, and gave thanks, and said, Take this, and divide it among yourselves:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Yesuusi burccukkuwaa ekkidi, Xoossaa galatidi, "Heite; hagaa burccukkuwan de7iyaagaa shaakkidi uyite.

English Sentences: For I say unto you, I will not drink of the fruit of the vine, until the kingdom of God shall come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani inttessi odais; Xoossaa kawotettai yaana gakkanaashin, hachchippe doommada woiniyaa eessaa uyikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took bread, and gave thanks, and brake it, and gave unto them, saying, This is my body which is given for you: this do in remembrance of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi oittaa ekkidi, Xoossaa galatiis; he oittaa menttidi, etassi immidi, "Hagee intteyyo imettida ta ashuwaa; hagan tana hassayite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Likewise also the cup after supper, saying, This cup is the new testament in my blood, which is shed for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kahuwaa mirggidoogaappe guyye baggan, kaseegaadan burccukkuwaa etassi immidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Hagee inttessi gukkiya ta suuttan maacettida ooratta maachchaa.

English Sentences: But, behold, the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin be7ite; tana aattidi immana bitanee tanaara masoofiyan issippe mees.

English Sentences: And truly the Son of man goeth, as it was determined: but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed!
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani Asa Na7ai, Xoossai ba qofaa qachchidoogaadan bais; shin tana aattidi immana uraassi aayye7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they began to enquire among themselves, which of them it was that should do this thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta giddoppe hegaadan oottanau ooni qoppidaakko, issoi issuwaa oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And there was also a strife among them, which of them should be accounted the greatest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi bantta ubbaappe ooni gitakko bantta giddon palamettidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors.
Wolaitta Sentences: Palamettin Yesuusi eta yaagiis; "Ha sa7an de7iya kawoti bantta asaa godatoosona. Eta haariyaageeti kehiyaageeta geetettoosona.

English Sentences: But ye shall not be so: but he that is greatest among you, let him be as the younger; and he that is chief, as he that doth serve.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intteppe gitatiyaagee intte ubbaappe guuxxiyaagaa mala gidanaappe attin, intte hegaadan hanoppite; inttena haariyaagee inttessi ashkkaradan hano.

English Sentences: For whether is greater, he that sitteth at meat, or he that serveth? is not he that sitteth at meat? but I am among you as he that serveth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qumaa maanau uttiyaagee giteeyye qumaa sinttau aattiyaagee gitee? Qumaa maanau uttidaagee gita gidennee? SHin taani intte giddon qumaa sinttau aattiya ashkkara mala.

English Sentences: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi taani paacettiyo wode tana yeggibeennaageeta.

English Sentences: And I appoint unto you a kingdom, as my Father hath appointed unto me;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta kawotettan taani qumaa miyo sohuwan intte maana malanne, uyana mala,

English Sentences: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom, and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi tammanne naa77u Israa7eela zaretu bolli pirddiiddi, araatatun uttana mala, ta Aawai tana sunttidoogaadan, taani inttena sunttais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the Lord said, Simon, Simon, behold, Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat:
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai, "Simoonaa, Simoonaa, akeeka; asai gisttiyaa harqqiyoogaadan, Seexaanai inttena harqqanau Xoossaa woossin, Xoossai ero giis.

English Sentences: But I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not: and when thou art converted, strengthen thy brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani ne ammanoi bayenna mala, neessi Xoossaa woossaas; neeni taakko simmiyo wode, ne ishantta minttetta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, Lord, I am ready to go with thee, both into prison, and to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simooni, "Godau, taani nenaara qasho keettaa baanau, qassi nenaara haiqqanaukka giigaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, I tell thee, Peter, the cock shall not crow this day, before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi, "PHeexiroosaa, taani neeyyo odais; hachchi qammi, kuttoi waassanaappe kase, neeni tana eriyoogaa heezzutoo kaddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, When I sent you without purse, and scrip, and shoes, lacked ye any thing? And they said, Nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratussi, "Korjjoi woi qarcciiti woi caammi bainnan taani inttena kiittido wode, inttessi paccidabi de7ii?" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Aibinne baawa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then said he unto them, But now, he that hath a purse, let him take it, and likewise his scrip: and he that hath no sword, let him sell his garment, and buy one.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "SHin ha77i korjjoi woi qarcciiti de7iyoi ooninne ekki efo. Bisoi bainna urai ooninne ba maayuwaa baizzidikka issi biso shammo.

English Sentences: For I say unto you, that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me, And he was reckoned among the transgressors: for the things concerning me have an end.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani inttessi odais; Xoossaa maxaafan xaafettida tabai polettiyo gishshau, Hagee mooranchchatuura paidettiis geetettidi xaafettidaagee tanan polettanau bessees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said, Lord, behold, here are two swords. And he said unto them, It is enough.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erissiyo ashkkarati, "Godau, hagan naa77u bisoti de7oosona" yaagin Yesuusi, "Hegee gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he came out, and went, as he was wont, to the mount of Olives; and his disciples also followed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi katamaappe kiyidi, haroodeegaadan Dabira Zaite Deriyaa kiyiis. Qassi erissiyo ashkkaratikka a kaallidosona.

English Sentences: And when he was at the place, he said unto them, Pray that ye enter not into temptation.
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwaa gakkidi, "Paaciyan intte gelennan attana mala, Xoossaa woossite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone's cast, and kneeled down, and prayed,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHuchchaa olin gakkiyo sohuwaa keenaa etappe haakki biidi gulbbatidi

English Sentences: Saying, Father, if thou be willing, remove this cup from me: nevertheless not my will, but thine, be done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa, "Ta Aawau, neeni koyiyoobaa gidikko, ha burccukkuwaa taappe digga; shin neeni koyiyoobai hanoppe attin, taani koyiyoobai hanoppo" yaagidi woossiis.

English Sentences: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven, strengthening him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaappe yiidi minttettiya kiitanchchai ayyo beettiis.

English Sentences: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba wozanaa giddon mishettidi, daro minttidi woossees. I cawattiyo cawai sa7an xokkiya suutta milatees.

English Sentences: And when he rose up from prayer, and was come to his disciples, he found them sleeping for sorrow,
Wolaitta Sentences: Woosaappe denddidi, ba erissiyo ashkkaratukko guyye biis. Biidi eti daro qarettido gishshau, daafuridi xiskkidaageeta demmidi,

English Sentences: And said unto them, Why sleep ye? rise and pray, lest ye enter into temptation.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aissi xiskkeetii? Paaciyan gelennan attana mala, denddidi Xoossaa woossite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And while he yet spake, behold a multitude, and he that was called Judas, one of the twelve, went before them, and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I biron hegaa haasayishin, asai yiis. Tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issi Yihudaa giyoogee he asaa kaalettiiddi, Yesuusa yeranau akko shiiqiis.

English Sentences: But Jesus said unto him, Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi a, "Yihudaa, neeni tana Asa Na7aa yerada aatta immai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When they which were about him saw what would follow, they said unto him, Lord, shall we smite with the sword?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusaara de7iya erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa be7ido wode a, "Godau, nuuni eta bisuwan shocanee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest, and cut off his right ear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issoi qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaraa shocidi, a ushachcha haittaa qanxxi oliis.

English Sentences: And Jesus answered and said, Suffer ye thus far. And he touched his ear, and healed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi, "Aggite" yaagidi, a haittaa bochchidi pattiis.

English Sentences: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests, and captains of the temple, and the elders, which were come to him, Be ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and staves?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi baakko yiida qeese halaqata, Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata azaziyaageetanne cima asaa hagaadan yaagiis; "Tana pangga kessidi, pangga oiqqiyoogaadan oiqqanau bisonne dulla oiqqidi yiidetii?

English Sentences: When I was daily with you in the temple, ye stretched forth no hands against me: but this is your hour, and the power of darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Beeta Maqidasiyan gallassi gallassi inttenaara de7iyo wode tana oiqqibeekketa; shin hagee intte wodenne xumaa wolqqaa wode" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then took they him, and led him, and brought him into the high priest's house. And Peter followed afar off.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa qachchidi, qeese ubbatu halaqaa soo ekki efiidosona. Qassi PHeexiroosi haahuwan kaalliis.

English Sentences: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall, and were set down together, Peter sat down among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti dirssa giddon tamaa eettidi, issippe uttidaashin, PHeexiroosikka eta giddo gelidi, utti bayiis.

English Sentences: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire, and earnestly looked upon him, and said, This man was also with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi ashkkariyaa PHeexiroosi tamaa achchan uttidaagaa be7idaara tishshi ootta xeellada, "Hageekka aara issippe de7ees" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And he denied him, saying, Woman, I know him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi, "Ha mishiree, taani a erikke" yaagidi kaddiis.

English Sentences: And after a little while another saw him, and said, Thou art also of them. And Peter said, Man, I am not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guuttaa gam77ishin, issoi PHeexiroosa be7idi, "Neenikka etaara issippe de7aasa" yaagiis. SHin PHeexiroosi, "Hagoo, taani etaara issippe de7ikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed, saying, Of a truth this fellow also was with him: for he is a Galilaean.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara bitanee issi saate gidiyaagaa keenaappe guyyiyan, "Ha bitaneekka Galiila asa gidiyo gishshau, aara de7iyoogee tuma" yaagidi minttidi odiis.

English Sentences: And Peter said, Man, I know not what thou sayest. And immediately, while he yet spake, the cock crew.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi, "Hagoo, neeni giyoobai aibakko taani erikke" yaagiis. I biron haasayishin, sohuwaarakka kuttoi waassi aggiis.

English Sentences: And the Lord turned, and looked upon Peter. And Peter remembered the word of the Lord, how he had said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai guyye simmidi, PHeexiroosa xeelliis. Xeellin PHeexiroosi Godai bana, "Neeni hachchi kuttoi waassanaappe kase, heezzutoo tana kaddana" giidoogaa hassayiis.

English Sentences: And Peter went out, and wept bitterly.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi kare kiyidi, mishettidi yeekkiis.

English Sentences: And the men that held Jesus mocked him, and smote him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa oiqqida asati shocoosonanne a bolli qilliiccoosona.

English Sentences: And when they had blindfolded him, they struck him on the face, and asked him, saying, Prophesy, who is it that smote thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: A aifiyaa goozidi, "Nena dechchidai oonee? Ane hananabaa yoota" yaagidi a oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi a hara daro cashshaa cayidosona.

English Sentences: And as soon as it was day, the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together, and led him into their council, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttin dere cimati, qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti issisaa shiiqidi, Yesuusa bantta shiiqidosaa efiidi,

English Sentences: Art thou the Christ? tell us. And he said unto them, If I tell you, ye will not believe:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kiristtoosi nenee? Nuussi oda" yaagidosona. SHin i yaagidi zaariis; "Taani inttessi odikko, tana ammanekketa.

English Sentences: And if I also ask you, ye will not answer me, nor let me go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani inttena oichchikko odekketa; woi tana qashuwaappe birshshekketa.

English Sentences: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani Asa Na7ai, ha77ippe doommada, wolqqaama Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said they all, Art thou then the Son of God? And he said unto them, Ye say that I am.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbai Yesuusa, "Yaatin neeni Xoossaa Na7ee?" yaagidosona. Yaagin i zaaridi, "Intte tana, Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa giyoogaa tumaa geeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said, What need we any further witness? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Nuuni nu huuphiyan a doonaappe siyida; simmi hagaappe sinttan nuna ai markka koshshii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the whole multitude of them arose, and led him unto Pilate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbai issippe denddidi, Yesuusa PHilaaxoosakko efiidosona.

English Sentences: And they began to accuse him, saying, We found this fellow perverting the nation, and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar, saying that he himself is Christ a King.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efiidi, "Hagee nu dere asaa balettishin, asai Roome biittaa kawuwaassi giiraa immenna mala diggishiininne qassi, Taani kawuwaa yaagishin demmida" yaagidi Yesuusa mootuwaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: And Pilate asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answered him and said, Thou sayest it.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa, "Neeni Aihudatu kawoo?" yaagidi oichchiis. Yesuusi zaaridi a, "Neenikka gaasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people, I find no fault in this man.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi qeese halaqatussinne asaassi odiiddi, "Ha bitaniyaa bolli taani harai atto issi moorokka demmabeikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they were the more fierce, saying, He stirreth up the people, teaching throughout all Jewry, beginning from Galilee to this place.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti, "Hagee Galiilappe doommidi, harai atto hagaa gakkanaashinkka, Yihudaa biitta ubban tamaarissiiddi, asa ooshshees" yaagidi minttidi yootidosona.

English Sentences: When Pilate heard of Galilee, he asked whether the man were a Galilaean.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi hegaa siyido wode, "I Galiila asee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod's jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi Heeroodisi heemmiyo biittan Yesuusi de7iyoogaa eridi, he wode Yerusalaamen de7iya Heeroodisakko a yeddiis.

English Sentences: And when Herod saw Jesus, he was exceeding glad: for he was desirous to see him of a long season, because he had heard many things of him; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisi Yesuusa be7anau daro wodiyaappe doommidi amotti uttido gishshau, a be7ido wode daro ufaittiis. I amottidoogee kase Yesuusabaa siyidoogaassa. Qassi Yesuusi oottiyo malaataappe be7ana yaagidi, qoppiiddi de7ees.

English Sentences: Then he questioned with him in many words; but he answered him nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisi Yesuusa darobaa oichchiis; shin Yesuusi ayyo ainne zaaribeenna.

English Sentences: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti a minttidi mootiiddi, hegan eqqi bayidosona.

English Sentences: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought, and mocked him, and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe, and sent him again to Pilate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisinne a wotaaddarati Yesuusa karidi, a bolli qilliiccidosona. Alleequwaara de7iya maayuwaa a maizzidi, PHilaaxoosakko zaaridi yeddidosona.

English Sentences: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together: for before they were at enmity between themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe kase bantta giddon morkketti uttida PHilaaxoosinne Heeroodisi he gallassi dabbotidosona.

English Sentences: And Pilate, when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi qeese halaqata, deriyaa haariyaageetanne asaa issippe xeesidi,

English Sentences: Said unto them, Ye have brought this man unto me, as one that perverteth the people: and, behold, I, having examined him before you, have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him:
Wolaitta Sentences: hagaadan yaagiis; "Asa balettees yaagidi ha bitaniyaa taakko ehiideta; be7ite; taani a intte sinttan qoridoogaappe guyyiyan, intte a mootido mootuwan a bolli ainne balabaa demmabeikke.

English Sentences: No, nor yet Herod: for I sent you to him; and, lo, nothing worthy of death is done unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Heeroodisi a nuukko haa yeddido gishshau, a bolli ainne demmibeennaagee erettees. Be7ite; ha bitanee bana worissanau bessiyaabaa ainne oottibeenna.

English Sentences: I will therefore chastise him, and release him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani a lissuwan garafada, birshsha yeddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: (For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast.)
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosayyo Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassan issi ura qashuwaappe birshshiyo meezee de7ees.

English Sentences: And they cried out all at once, saying, Away with this man, and release unto us Barabbas:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti ubbai issippe, "Ha bitaniyaa worada nuussi Barbbaana birshsha" yaagiiddi wocamidosona.

English Sentences: (Who for a certain sedition made in the city, and for murder, was cast into prison.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Barbbaani kataman ooshshaa kessidi, asa worido gishshau, qasho keettan qashettidi de7ees.

English Sentences: Pilate therefore, willing to release Jesus, spake again to them.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa birshshanau koyidi, naa77anttuwaa etassi haasayiis.

English Sentences: But they cried, saying, Crucify him, crucify him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti, "Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan a xishada kaqqa! Kaqqa!" yaagiiddi wocamoosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them the third time, Why, what evil hath he done? I have found no cause of death in him: I will therefore chastise him, and let him go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzanttuwaa PHilaaxoosi eta, "Aissi? I ai iitabaa oottidee? SHemppo worissiya iitabaa a bolli demmabeikke; hegaa gishshau, lissuwan a garafada, birshsha yeddana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they were instant with loud voices, requiring that he might be crucified. And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettana mala, eti qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, minttidi yootidosona. Eta wocamainne qeese halaqatu qaalai darido gishshau,

English Sentences: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required.
Wolaitta Sentences: eti woossiiddi uttido pirddaa PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa bolli pirddiis.

English Sentences: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison, whom they had desired; but he delivered Jesus to their will.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi kase eti birshshissarkkii yaagidi woossiiddi uttido bitaniyaa birshshissiis; birshshettidaagee ooshshaa gishshaunne shemppuwaa worido gishshau qashettida bitaniyaa. SHin eti Yesuusa bantta koyidoogaadan oottana mala, PHilaaxoosi a etassi aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: And as they led him away, they laid hold upon one Simon, a Cyrenian, coming out of the country, and on him they laid the cross, that he might bear it after Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa efiiddi, issi Simoona giyo Qareena biitta asi gaxaappe katamaa yiyaagaa oiqqidi, Yesuusappe guyyeera tookkana mala, masqqaliyaa a bolli wottidosona.

English Sentences: And there followed him a great company of people, and of women, which also bewailed and lamented him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeekkiiddinne waassiiddi uttida maccaasatinne keehi daro asai issippe a kaalliis.

English Sentences: But Jesus turning unto them said, Daughters of Jerusalem, weep not for me, but weep for yourselves, and for your children.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi etakko simmidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Yerusalaame maccaasatoo, taassi yeekkoppite;

English Sentences: For, behold, the days are coming, in the which they shall say, Blessed are the barren, and the wombs that never bare, and the paps which never gave suck.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin asai, Maine maccaasati, na7a mulekka yelibeenna maccaasati, na7a mulekka xanttibeenna maccaasati bantta hailau yaagana gallassai yiyo gishshau, intte huuphessinne intte naatussi yeekkite.

English Sentences: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains, Fall on us; and to the hills, Cover us.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode eti dereta, Nu bolli kunddite! yaagana. Keratakka, Nuna genttite! geettaa doommana.

English Sentences: For if they do these things in a green tree, what shall be done in the dry?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti qayye mittaa hagaadan oottiyaageeta gidikko, mela mittaa waataneeshsha?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And there were also two other, malefactors, led with him to be put to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitabaa oottida naa77u asatakka Yesuusaara gattidi woranau efiidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were come to the place, which is called Calvary, there they crucified him, and the malefactors, one on the right hand, and the other on the left.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guuggiyaa giyo sohuwaa gakkidi, masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan Yesuusa xishidi kaqqidosona. He iitabaa oottidaageetakka he sohuwan issuwaa Yesuusappe ushachcha baggaara, issuwaa haddirssa baggaara, masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqidosona.

English Sentences: Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And they parted his raiment, and cast lots.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "Ta Aawau, eti bantta oottiyoogaa erenna gishshau, eta nagaraa atto ga" yaagiis. A maayuwaa shaakkidi, saamaa yeggidosona.

English Sentences: And the people stood beholding. And the rulers also with them derided him, saying, He saved others; let him save himself, if he be Christ, the chosen of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai eqqidi xeellishin, deriyaa haariyaageeti, "Harata ashshiis; Xoossai doorido a i gidikko, ane bana ashsho" yaagiiddi a karidi qilliiccoosona.

English Sentences: And the soldiers also mocked him, coming to him, and offering him vinegar,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi wotaaddarati akko shiiqidi, woiniyaa eessaa caalaa ehiidi,

English Sentences: And saying, If thou be the king of the Jews, save thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni Aihudatu kawo gidikko, ane ne huuphiyaa ashsha" yaagidi a bolli qilliiccoosona.

English Sentences: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek, and Latin, and Hebrew, THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi, "Hagee Aihudatu kawuwaa" giidi, Giriike qaalan, Roomaisxxe qaalaaninne Ibraisxxe qaalan xaafido xifatee a huuphessaara de7ees.

English Sentences: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him, saying, If thou be Christ, save thyself and us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitabaa oottidi masqqaliyan kaqettida asatuppe issoi, "Neeni a gidikko, ane nenanne nunanne ashsha" yaagidi Yesuusa naassiis.

English Sentences: But the other answering rebuked him, saying, Dost not thou fear God, seeing thou art in the same condemnation?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hankkoi a, "Neeni hagaa mala pirddan de7aiddakka Xoossaassi yayyikkii?

English Sentences: And we indeed justly; for we receive the due reward of our deeds: but this man hath done nothing amiss.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nu oosuwaa malaa ekkiyo gishshau, nuussi imettida pirddai bessiyaagaa; shin hagee ainne iitabaa oottibeenna" yaagidi a hanqqettiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto Jesus, Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Yesuusa, "Yesuusaa, neeni ne kawotettaa wolqqan yiyo wode, tana dogoppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yesuusi, "Taani neessi tumaa odais; hachchi neeni tanaara gannatiyan de7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it was about the sixth hour, and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode usuppun saate heera gidin, awai xumiis; uddufun saate gakkanaashin, biitta ubban sa7ai xumiis.

English Sentences: And the sun was darkened, and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xumin Beeta Maqidasiyan kaqettida magalashoikka naa77u kiyidi, pooshetti wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice, he said, Father, into thy hands I commend my spirit: and having said thus, he gave up the ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Ta Aawau, taani ta shemppuwaa ne kushiyan wottais" yaagidi haiqqi bayiis.

English Sentences: Now when the centurion saw what was done, he glorified God, saying, Certainly this was a righteous man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mato halaqai hegaa be7idi, "Hagee tumu xillo asa" yaagidi Xoossaa galatiis.

English Sentences: And all the people that came together to that sight, beholding the things which were done, smote their breasts, and returned.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa be7anau issisaa shiiqi uttida asai ubbai hegaa be7ido wode, bantta tiraa bubbuxiiddi, soo simmidosona.

English Sentences: And all his acquaintance, and the women that followed him from Galilee, stood afar off, beholding these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa eriya asai ubbainne Galiilappe a kaallida maccaasati hegaa be7iiddi, haahuwan eqqidosona.

English Sentences: And, behold, there was a man named Joseph, a counsellor; and he was a good man, and a just:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7aa alaafetuppe issi Yooseefa giyo lo77o xillo bitanee de7ees.

English Sentences: (The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them;) he was of Arimathaea, a city of the Jews: who also himself waited for the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi eta zoretaanne eta oosuwaa dosibeenna. I Armmaatiyaasa geetettiya Aihudatu katamaa asa; qassi Xoossaa kawotettaa naagiiddi uttiis.

English Sentences: This man went unto Pilate, and begged the body of Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: He bitanee PHilaaxoosakko biidi, Yesuusa ahaa ekkanau woossiis.

English Sentences: And he took it down, and wrapped it in linen, and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone, wherein never man before was laid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi masqqaliyaappe ahaa wottidi, moogo afalan xaaxiis. Xaaxidi shuchchaa woocido asa moogiyo gonggoluwaa giddon kase ooninne moogettibeennaagan ahaa wottiis.

English Sentences: And that day was the preparation, and the sabbath drew on.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee Sambbataassi giigettiyo gallassa; Sambbatai doommana hanees.

English Sentences: And the women also, which came with him from Galilee, followed after, and beheld the sepulchre, and how his body was laid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Galiilappe Yesuusaara yiida maccaasati Yooseefa kaalliiddi, Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaanne a ahaa waati wottidaakko be7idosona.

English Sentences: And they returned, and prepared spices and ointments; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7idi soo simmidi, shittuwaanne tiyettiyoobaa giigissidosona. Higgee azaziyoogaadan, Sambbatan shemppidosona.

English Sentences: Now upon the first day of the week, very early in the morning, they came unto the sepulchre, bringing the spices which they had prepared, and certain others with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin woggaa gallassi wonttimaattan maccaasati bantta giigissido shittuwaa ekkidi, Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi, gonggoluwaa doonaappe shuchchaa gonddorssidoogaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: And they entered in, and found not the body of the Lord Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin giddo gelidi, Godaa Yesuusa ahaa demmibookkona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as they were much perplexed thereabout, behold, two men stood by them in shining garments:
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasati, "Haha! Laa hagee waaniichchidee?" yaagishin, phooliya maayuwaa maayida naa77u asati eti akeekennan eta matan eqqidosona.

English Sentences: And as they were afraid, and bowed down their faces to the earth, they said unto them, Why seek ye the living among the dead?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yayyidi, sa7aa xeellidaashin, asati eta yaagidosona; "Paxa de7iyaagaa haiqqida asaa sohuwan aissi koyeetii?

English Sentences: He is not here, but is risen: remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee,
Wolaitta Sentences: I denddiichchiis; hagan baawa. Yesuusi, Tana Asa Na7aa asai nagaranchchatussi aattidi immin, masqqaliyaa bolli tana misimaariyan xishin,

English Sentences: Saying, The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men, and be crucified, and the third day rise again.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani kaqettanaunne heezzantto gallassi denddanau bessees yaagidi kase Galiilan de7iyo wode, inttessi odidoogaa hassayite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they remembered his words,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin maccaasati Yesuusi giidoogaa hassayidi, i moogettido gonggoluwaappe simmidi,

English Sentences: And returned from the sepulchre, and told all these things unto the eleven, and to all the rest.
Wolaitta Sentences: hegaa ubbaa tammanne isiini erissiyo ashkkaratussinne haratu ubbaassi odidosona.

English Sentences: It was Mary Magdalene, and Joanna, and Mary the mother of James, and other women that were with them, which told these things unto the apostles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi odidai Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaamo, Yohaano, Yaaqooba aayyiyoo Mairaamonne, qassi etaara de7iya hara maccaasata.

English Sentences: And their words seemed to them as idle tales, and they believed them not.
Wolaitta Sentences: He maccaasatu qaalai pattenna haasaya misatin, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti ammanibookkona.

English Sentences: Then arose Peter, and ran unto the sepulchre; and stooping down, he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves, and departed, wondering in himself at that which was come to pass.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi denddidi, gonggoluwaa woxxiis; hokkidi gonggoluwaa giddo xeellidi, moogido afalaa xalaalaa be7iis. Hegaa be7idi garamettiiddi, ba soo biis.

English Sentences: And, behold, two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus, which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa kaalliyaageetuppe naa77ati hanidabaa ubbaa bantta giddon haasayiiddi,

English Sentences: And they talked together of all these things which had happened.
Wolaitta Sentences: he gallassi Yerusalaameppe naa77u saate keenaa haakkiya Emaahuusa giyo qeeri katamaa boosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, while they communed together and reasoned, Jesus himself drew near, and went with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biiddi eti issippe haasayishiininne zorettishin, Yesuusi ba huuphen etakko shiiqidi, etaara bees.

English Sentences: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti a erenna mala, eta wozanaa jallissiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another, as ye walk, and are sad?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Ha intte kayyottidi hemettiiddi, issoi issuwaara haasayiyo yohoi aibee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the one of them, whose name was Cleopas, answering said unto him, Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem, and hast not known the things which are come to pass there in these days?
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issoi Qalayoopha giyoogee zaaridi, "Ha giddon Yerusalaamen hanidabaa erennan Yerusalaame be7anau biida imatti ne xalaalee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, What things? And they said unto him, Concerning Jesus of Nazareth, which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi, "I aibee?" yaagiis. Eti hagaadan yaagidosona; "Xoossaa sinttaaninne asa ubbaa sinttan oosuwaaninne qaalan hananabaa yootiya mino gidida Naazireeta Yesuusabaa.

English Sentences: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death, and have crucified him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu qeese halaqatinne deriyaa haariyaageeti haiquwaa pirddaassi a aatti immidi, masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi, a kaqqidosona.

English Sentences: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel: and beside all this, to day is the third day since these things were done.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni, Israa7eelata ashshanaagee a yaagidi ufaissan naagoos. Qassi hegee ubbai hanoosappe hachchi heezzu gallassa gidiis.

English Sentences: Yea, and certain women also of our company made us astonished, which were early at the sepulchre;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi nunaara de7iya issi issi maccaasati garamiyaabaa nuuyyo odidosona. Yesuusa moogido gonggoluwaa wonttimaattan biidi,

English Sentences: And when they found not his body, they came, saying, that they had also seen a vision of angels, which said that he was alive.
Wolaitta Sentences: a ahaa demmibookkona; "I paxa de7ees" yaagiya kiitanchchatu ajjuutaa be7ida yaagiiddi guyye simmidosona.

English Sentences: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre, and found it even so as the women had said: but him they saw not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nunaara de7iyaageetuppe issoi issoi gonggoluwaa biidi, maccaasati etassi giidoogaadan hanidaagaa be7idosona; shin Yesuusa be7ibookkona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then he said unto them, O fools, and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi eta, "Intte aiba eeyya asee? Hananabaa yootiyaageeti odido ubbabaa intte wozanan ammananau waanidi gam77eetii?

English Sentences: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things, and to enter into his glory?
Wolaitta Sentences: I ha waayiyaa ekkanaunne ba bonchchuwaa bonchchettanau bessennee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets, he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Muuse maxaafaappenne hananabaa yootiyaageetu maxaafaappe doommidi, Xoossaa maxaafatu ubban babai xaafettidaagaa etassi birshshiis.

English Sentences: And they drew nigh unto the village, whither they went: and he made as though he would have gone further.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta biyo qeeri katamaakko matishin, Yesuusi etassi haaho sohuwaa baanabaa milatiis;

English Sentences: But they constrained him, saying, Abide with us: for it is toward evening, and the day is far spent. And he went in to tarry with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin eti Yesuusa, "Sa7ai omariyo gishshau, nunaara aqa; sa7ainne qammana hanees" yaagidi teqqidosona. Hegaa gishshau, Yesuusi etaara aqanau geliis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as he sat at meat with them, he took bread, and blessed it, and brake, and gave to them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etaara qumaa maanau uttidi, oittaa ekkidi anjjiis; menttidi etassi immiis.

English Sentences: And their eyes were opened, and they knew him; and he vanished out of their sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a akeekana mala, eta aifee dooyettin, Yesuusa gididoogaa eridosona; erin i eta aifiyaappe geemmiis.

English Sentences: And they said one to another, Did not our heart burn within us, while he talked with us by the way, and while he opened to us the scriptures?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta giddon, "I nuussi ogiyan odishiininne Xoossaa maxaafata birshshishin, nu wozanai mishettidi xuugettibeennee?" yaagidi haasayettidosona.

English Sentences: And they rose up the same hour, and returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven gathered together, and them that were with them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti sohuwaara denddidi, Yerusalaame simmidosona; tammanne isiini erissiyo ashkkaratinne etaara de7iyaageeti, "Godai tumu denddiis;

English Sentences: Saying, The Lord is risen indeed, and hath appeared to Simon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoonikka a be7iis" yaagiiddi issippe shiiqi uttidaageeta demmidosona.

English Sentences: And they told what things were done in the way, and how he was known of them in breaking of bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: He naa77ati ogiyan hanidabaanne Yesuusi oittaa menttiyo wode, eti a waati eridaakkonne etassi odidosona.

English Sentences: And as they thus spake, Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa odishin, Yesuusi ba huuphen eta giddo yiidi eqqidi, "Sarotettai inttessi gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But they were terrified and affrighted, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti dagammidi yayyidosona. Qassi etassi moitillee beettiyaabaa milatiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Why are ye troubled? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts?
Wolaitta Sentences: Milatin i eta, "Aissi dagammeetii? Intte wozanan aissi sireetii?

English Sentences: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani tana gididoogaa, ta kushiyaanne ta tohuwaa be7ite; tana oiqqi xeellite; aissi giikko, moitillessi ashoinne meqetti baawa; shin intte be7iyoogaadan, taassi de7ees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had thus spoken, he shewed them his hands and his feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa yaagidi, ba kushiyaanne ba tohuwaa eta bessiis.

English Sentences: And while they yet believed not for joy, and wondered, he said unto them, Have ye here any meat?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee eta ufaissin, eti garamettidi, biron ammananau danddayibeenna gishshau i, "Hagan aibakko inttessi miyoobi de7ii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish, and of an honeycomb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiixxido moliyaappe issi muxuwaanne eessaa ililuwaappe eti ayyo immin,

English Sentences: And he took it, and did eat before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: ekkidi eta sinttan miis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, These are the words which I spake unto you, while I was yet with you, that all things must be fulfilled, which were written in the law of Moses, and in the prophets, and in the psalms, concerning me.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta, "Taani inttenaara de7aidda, Muuse higgiyan, hananabaa yootiyaageetu maxaafaaninne Daawita mazamuriyaa maxaafan tabai xaafettidaagee ubbai polettanau bessees yaagada, inttessi yootido yohoi hagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, Xoossaa maxaafati giyoogee etassi gelana mala, eta wozanaa dooyiis.

English Sentences: And said unto them, Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day:
Wolaitta Sentences: Dooyidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "I waayettanaunne heezzantta gallassi haiquwaappe denddanau bessees.

English Sentences: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi nagaraappe simmiyoogeenne nagaraa atto giyoogee Yerusalaameppe doommidi, Aihuda gidenna asa ubbaassi a sunttan odettanau bessees geetettidi xaafettiis.

English Sentences: And ye are witnesses of these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha yohuwaassi intte markka.

English Sentences: And, behold, I send the promise of my Father upon you: but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem, until ye be endued with power from on high.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta Aawai immana giidoogaa taani inttessi yeddana; shin Xoossai saluwaappe yiya wolqqaa inttena afaladan maizzana gakkanaassi, Yerusalaame kataman naagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he led them out as far as to Bethany, and he lifted up his hands, and blessed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Biitaaniyaa giyo katamaa gakkanaashin eta kaalettiis; ba kushiyaa sinttau yeddidi, eta anjjiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, while he blessed them, he was parted from them, and carried up into heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Anjjiiddi etappe shaahettidi, saluwaa biis.

English Sentences: And they worshipped him, and returned to Jerusalem with great joy:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ayyo goinnidi, daro ufaissan Yerusalaame simmidosona.

English Sentences: And were continually in the temple, praising and blessing God. Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa galatiiddi, paccennan Beeta Maqidasiyan de7idosona.
